She works every day from 6 in the morning until 7 at night. She has been in business for 12 years and it has gone very well. This loan will be used to purchase more products, such as rice, cooking oil, beans, bullion powder, and corn.

loans.use: to purchase rice, cooking oil, beans, corn, and other products for resale.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 36 años, es una mujer muy humilde y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es sobresalir en la vida. Ella desde algunos años se dedica al bordado de vestidos, actividad que le demanda prácticamente todo día, puesto que debe ser muy minuciosa en el acabado. La manera de trabajar de Ana consiste en recibir pedidos de diferentes comerciantes, quienes le dan cierta cantidad de prendas para que Ana pueda adornarlos con diferentes y novedosos bordados y hacerlos más llamativos. A ella le gusta mucho su trabajo porque le permite poner toda su creatividad en los trabajos, realizándolo a su propio gusto, sin embargo la parte difícil radica en esforzar su vista para ensartar las mostacillas con las que adorna sus prendas,  puesto que estas  son muy pequeñas. Es su quinto crédito con MFP y siempre ha sido muy puntual en todos sus pagos. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará materiales para el adorno de las prendas que le dejan y así lograr mejores resultados.
texts.en:
36 year-old Ana is a very humble and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home and what she wishes for more than anything is to do well in life.  For some years she has been embroidering dresses.  This is an activity that takes practically all day since she must be very meticulous in putting the finishing touches to her work.  The way Ana works is that she receives orders from different salespeople who provide her with a certain quantity of garments for her to decorate with different and original embroidery work.  Her job is to make the garments more striking.

Ana enjoys her work a lot because she is able to put all her creativity into it, doing the work according to her own taste.  However, the difficult part of her work is having to strain her eyes in order to string the beads with which she decorates the garments because they are very small.

This is Ana's fifth loan from MFP and she has always been very punctual in making her repayments.  She will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy materials for decorating the garments that she is given, so that she can obtain better results.

loans.use: to buy materials for embroidering garments

loans.name: Dédé Marlène

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits cosmétiques  à domicile depuis 01 an, Marlène est célibataire .elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Ce premier crédit servira à se réapprovisionner en mèches et en produits de beauté pour satisfaire les besoins de ses clientes qui sont sans cesse croissants .Elle a  27 ans  et est déterminé à se battre dans la vie pour gagner son pain quotidien.
texts.en:
Marlène is single, and has been selling beauty products from home for one year. She obtains her supplies at the Grand Market in Lomé.

This first loan will allow her to re-stock on hair extensions and beauty products to meet the needs of her ever-growing customer base. She is 27 years old and determined to meet all of life's challenges in order to earn her daily bread.

loans.use: to buy and sell beauty products

loans.name: María Alicia

texts.es:
Dejar su pedacito D. tierra acompañada D. su esposo, sus 4 hijos y nada más que lo que llevaban puesto, fue la situación que María Alicia C. tuvo que enfrentar cuando grupos armados los obligaron a abandonar su terreno, en el que trabajaba ella y su familia. 

Después D. esta situación y con la esperanza D. recuperarse D. este duro golpe, esta emprendedora mujer inició con su esposo un negocio propio D. verduras, productos D. la canasta familiar, snacks y hasta venta D. minutos a celular. Es así como éste se ha convertido en su única fuente D. sustento y aunque María Alicia no olvida su procedencia considera que ha sido bendecida por poder seguir adelante. 

María Alicia sueña con ampliar su negocio hasta ser vendedora mayorista, así mismo con tener una vejez tranquila en la que la parte económica no sea una limitante. Para lograrlo y seguir luchando, esta emprendedora necesita D. un préstamo para realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas en su negocio y comprar mayor variedad D. verduras, dulces y productos D. la canasta familiar que le permitan incrementar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Having to leave her small plot of land, accompanied by her husband and four children, with nothing more than what they had on their backs, was the situation in which María Alicia C. found herself when armed gangs forced her to leave the land that she and her family worked on.

Following this situation, and with the hope of being able to recover from this hard blow, this enterprising woman, together with her husband, set up her own business selling vegetables, basic household groceries, snacks and even cell phone minutes.  This has now become her only source of support and, although María Alicia doesn't forget how her business came about, she considers herself to have been blessed as she has been able to move on and get ahead.

María Alicia dreams of expanding her business and becoming a wholesaler.  She also dreams of a peaceful old age in which she is not restricted by her financial situation.  In order to achieve this and continue fighting, this entrepreneur needs a loan so that she can make some structural changes to her business premises and buy a wider variety of vegetables, sweet treats and basic household groceries which will allow her to increase her sales and improve her income.

loans.use: to make some structural changes to her business premises and to buy a wider variety of vegetables, sweet treats and basic household groceries

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: La señora Julia se dedica a la venta de una variedad de productos de plástico los mismos que los comercializa en el interior del país. El crédito lo requiere para comprar material de construcción como ser: arena, cemento, vigas, etc., ya que construirá una nueva habitación. Vive en casa de parientes  la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Alto Jinchupalla en la ciudad de La Paz; Julia  es separada y tiene cinco hijos. Es la primera vez que trabaja con Impro y KIVA.
texts.en: Julia's business is selling a variety of plastic products.  She makes her sales in the provinces.  She needs this loan to buy construction supplies such as sand, cement, beams, etc. as she is going to build a new room.  Julia lives in her relatives' house which is located in Alto Jinchupalla district, in the city of La Paz.  Julia is separated and has five children.  This is the first time that she has worked with Impro and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, wood and bricks so that she can build a room and live more comfortably

loans.name: Isaura

texts.es:
A sus 61 años de edad, Isaura G. A. se siente feliz de ser una emprendedora pues con el paso de los años gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante, pues desde que falleció su esposo se vio obligada a trabajar para seguir adelante con sus 3 hijos. 

Isaura se dedicó a hacer lo que sabe, venta de comidas, que han sido de gran acogida por sus clientes, pues como ella misma lo afirma, como las cosas las hace con amor, su sabor es inigualable y aunque se dedica a hacer comida casera, se siente satisfecha de haber salido adelante. 

Isaura sueña con ampliar su negocio hasta generar empleo y posicionarlo en el mercado para ser reconocida y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Por ahora sigue trabajando con la convicción de que poco a poco lo logrará. Actualmente necesita de un préstamo para hacer algunas adecuaciones en el piso de su negocio puesto que es una exigencia que actualmente le solicitan para poder continuar trabajando.
texts.en:
At 61 years of age, Isaura G. A. feels happy to be an entrepreneur since, over the years, thanks to her efforts and commitment, she has managed to get her family ahead in life.  Since her husband died, she has had to work in order to get ahead together with her three children.

Isaura started working doing what she knew - selling meals.  Isaura's meals have been favorably received by her customers since, as she says, because she makes her meals with love, their flavor is unbeatable.  Although she produces home cooking, she feels satisfied that she has been able to get ahead.

Isaura dreams of expanding her business so that she can create employment, position her business in the market and become well known.  This will enable her to improve her quality of life.  For now, she continues to work with the conviction that she will gradually achieve her goal.  She currently needs a loan to do some work on the floor of her business premises.  This is something that she has been told she must do in order to be allowed to continue working.

loans.use: to do some work on the floor of her business premises

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou  Diène est âgée  de 61 ans. Elle habite dans le village de Yoff  depuis plusieurs années. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Elle s’active depuis plus de 40 ans dans le commerce d’habits de friperie. Auparavant elle travaillait comme  femme de ménage. Mais par la suite elle a choisi l’activité de commerce par passion. Elle est très intéressée  par la satisfaction qu’elle procure à sa clientèle  et la réalisation de bénéfices  a travers son activité. Madame Diène est membre du guichet de Yoff depuis novembre 2003. Elle a déjà remboursé 7 prêts antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit  de 350 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de friperie. Elle  souhaite renforcer son fond de roulement et élargir son activité. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettra d’améliorer les conditions de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Fatou  Diène, 61, has lived in the village of Yoff for a good number of years. She is married and the mother of four children. She has been working for more than 40 years selling second-hand clothing. Before that she worked as a maid, but she especially chose the work in sales  because she likes to see how she can satisfy her clientele and know that she is earning money from her work.  

Mrs. Diène has been a member of the Yoff branch since November 2003. She has already reimbursed seven prior loans. She is requesting a loan of 350,000 francs intended to buy used clothing. She hopes to grow her working capital and expand her business. The profit she makes will allow her to improve living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Ayawa Enyovi

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de 04 enfants avec un chauffeur, à 48 ans   Mme Ayawa  est revendeuse de maïs et de charbon de bois à domicile, elle achète à Tchamba et à Atakpamé (02 villes  situées à l’intérieur  à quelques kilomètres de la capitale Lomé).elle souhaiterait satisfaire les besoins des consommateurs qui chaque jour ne fait qu’accroître. La vie au quotidien n’est pas facile vu ses charges et elle est décidée à se battre sans relâche pour épauler son époux et  satisfaire les besoins grandissants  de ses enfants.
texts.en: Married and the mother of four children, Mrs. Ayawa, whose husband is a driver, sells maize and charcoal out of her home. She buys her goods in Tchamba and in Atakpamé (two towns located up-country, some kilometers from the capital, Lomé). She wants to satisfy the needs of the customers who are growing by the day. Daily life is not easy, taking into account her responsibilities, and she really wants to do her very best to help her husband out and satisfy the ever-growing needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal and of maize.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: La señora Julia comercializa cosméticos para damas y también elabora chocolates. El crédito lo requiere para comprar perfumes, así podrá  aumentar su capital de trabajo, es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir los gastos de su familia. Vive en alquiler en una casa, la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Achumani en  la ciudad de La Paz, Julia  es casada y tiene un hijo. Ella es cliente de Impro desde el año  2008.
texts.en: Julia sells ladies' cosmetics and she also makes chocolates.  She needs this loan to buy perfumes and thereby increase her working capital.  This is the source of income with which Julia covers her family's expenses.  She lives in a rental house in Achumani district, in the city of La Paz.  Julia is married and has one child.  She has been a client of Impro since 2008.

loans.use: to buy perfumes so that she can continue in her business selling cosmetics and perfume

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La señora Lourdes tiene una tienda donde comercializa cosméticos para damas . El crédito lo requiere para comprar: rubores, lápices  labiales, cremas, así podrá  aumentar su capital, sus ventas y por ende sus ingresos. Vive en alquiler la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz;  es soltera y no tiene hijos. Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Lourdes has a store where she sells women’s cosmetics.  She needs the loan to buy blush, lipstick, and creams.  That way she will be able to increase her capital and her sales in order to increase her earnings.

She rents where she lives in the Alto San Pedro zone in the city of La Paz.  She is single, and she does not have children.

This is the first time that she has requested a Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy blush, lipstick, and creams for her business of selling cosmetics.

loans.name: Felicia

texts.es:
Felicia nació en el distrito D. Taray provincia D. Calca del departamento del Cusco (Taray se encuentra a 45 minutos D. la ciudad del Cusco), ella tiene 40 años edad y tiene dos hijos un varón y una mujer. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad D. donD. nació. (La ciudad D. Taray se caracteriza por tener hermosos paisajes por ser una zona ganadera y agrícola). 

Su actividad económica principal D. Felicia es vender artesanía en el Mirador D. Taray que está ubicado a 10 minutos D. la ciudad D. Taray, ella sale a trabajar D. 8 D. la mañana hasta las 11 D. la mañana los días martes, jueves y domingos. (El Mirador D. Taray es el primer lugar donD. se pueD. realmente apreciar la belleza del Valle Sagrado.)

Felicia venD. artesanía D. tipo cerámica y ropa. Ya son 8 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Felicia requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo ropa, mochilas, sombreros, etc.

Felicia pertenece al banco comunal “Señor D. la Agonía D. Taray” D. la Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal esta en el cuarto D. año D. funcionamiento y les va muy bien a los socios.
texts.en:
Felicia was born in the Taray district, Calca province, Cusco department.  (Taray is 45 minutes from the city of Cusco.)  She is 40 years old, and she has two children; a boy and a girl.  She currently lives in the city where she was born.  (The city of Taray is known for its beautiful scenery, its agriculture, and its farming.)

Felicia’s main economic activity is selling handicrafts in Mirador D. Taray, which is ten minutes from the city of Taray.  She goes to work at 8:00 a.m., and she works until 11:00 a.m. on Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Sundays. (El Mirador D. Taray is the first place where you can truly appreciate the beauty of the Valle Sagrado.)

Felicia sells ceramic and clothing handicrafts.  She has had this business for eight years, and it is going very well for her.

Felicia now needs the loan to buy merchandise like clothes, backpacks, and hats, etc.

Felicia belongs to the Señor D. la Agonía D. Taray Communal Bank with the Asociación Arariwa.  The comunal bank is in its fourth year, and it is going very well for the members.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like clothes, backpacks, and hats, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance on his taxi.

loans.name: María Doris

texts.es:
La sonrisa de María  Doris refleja el amor que le pone a su negocio de venta de comida, es éste el que la impulsa a levantarse todos los días a tempranas hora para emprender su labor que le permite contribuir a cubrir los gastos del hogar, pues con lo que su esposo gana no alcanza para cubrir los gastos de la familia conformada por 4 hijos. 

María Doris es una soñadora que se visualiza en el futuro con su propia casa y allí mismo ubicar su negocio de forma más organizada y mucho más grande el cual le permita incrementar sus ingresos. Por ahora esta emprendedora continúa con su labor esperando que algún día su sueño sea una realidad. 

Actualmente, María Doris necesita de un préstamo para realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas como comprar otra mesa que le permita trabajar comodamente sus productos así como adquirir una nueva fritadora para agilizar sus procesos y hacerse a una sillas y unos parasoles para ofrecerle mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
María Doris' smile reflects the love that she puts into her business selling meals.  This is what motivates her to get up early every morning to start her work which allows her to contribute towards her household expenses.  The money her husband earns is not enough to cover their family expenses.  They have four children.

María Doris is a dreamer who sees herself, in the future, with her own home.  There she plans to locate her business in a more organized manner and she plans to make it much bigger.  This will allow her to increase her income.  For now, this entrepreneur continues in her work, hoping that some day her dream will become reality.

María Doris currently needs a loan to carry out some work in her premises.  She will buy another table which will allow her to work more comfortably and  a deep-fat fryer to speed up her work.  She will also buy some chairs and umbrellas to make her customers more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy a table, a deep-fat fryer, chairs and umbrellas

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret A. A. is fifty-two years old. She is widowed and has five children aged ten to twenty-four. Margaret runs a restaurant at a shopping centre in Kakamega, which is known as the sugar belt region for its production of sugarcane. She has been running this business for the last ten years and has managed to provide employment for three people. She says that this business is profitable and the major challenge she faces is the risk of food going bad for lack of refrigeration. However, she works very hard to keep her business doing well.

Maragret is using this loan of KES 70,000 to buy a refrigerator to store her food and keep it fresh longer. She hopes to grow her business into a big hotel at the shopping centre. She also sees herself buying a plot of land in the future and building rental units. She describes herself as a visionary lady.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator to store her food and keep it fresh longer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy three pigs

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Revendeuse  ambulante  de friperie  à Lomé depuis 11 ans, Akouvi est mariée à un transitaire  et mère de 01 enfant. Elle a 38 ans et à l’approche de la quarantaine elle veut améliorer sa méthode de vente et économiser de l’énergie. Elle s’approvisionne sur place.
texts.en: Akouvi is married to a forwarding-agent and the mother of one child. She is 38 and has been selling second-hand clothing on foot in Lomé for 11 years. Before turning 40, she would like to improve her sales method and use less energy. She buys her merchandise locally.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Luz Estela

texts.es:
A sus 56 años de edad, Luz Estela R. B. es una emprendedora consagrada a su negocio, confección de pijamas. El oficio lo aprendió desde pequeña al lado de su madre y sus hermanas. 

Luz Estela es una luchadora incansable que espera conquistar nuevos mercados con sus pijamas hasta convertirse en una gran comercializadora no sólo en Medellín sino en todo el país. Esta emprendedora considera que su trabajo ha sido no sólo la manera de seguir adelante sino una forma de superarse después de la separación de su esposo, lo que la llenó de valor y fuerzas para luchar por lo propio. 

Actualmente Luz Estela necesita de un préstamo para comprar telas y así incrementar su capacidad de producción así como mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
At 56 years old, Luz Estela R. B. is an entrepreneur who is devoted to her business making pajamas.  She learned the trade when she was a young girl from her mother and sisters.

Luz Estela is an relentless fighter who hopes to capture new markets with her pajamas and become an important seller not only in Medellín but throughout the country.  This entrepreneur considers her work to have been not only a way of getting ahead in life but also a way of improving herself since she separated from her husband.  It filled her with courage and the strength to stand up for herself.

Luz Estrela currently needs a loan to buy fabric and thereby increase her production capacity and improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Nafore Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Naforé est créé le 15 Novembre 2006 au jour d’inauguration du banc villageois. Il est composé de 10 femmes qui toutes issues du même quartier. Les membres ont des liens de parenté. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Ndoumbé D. (debout en deuxième position à partir de la gauche sur photo, et mise en médaillon en bas et à droite) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 59 ans. Elle est mariée et  mère de deux enfants. 

Elle vend des légumes et divers produits à domicile et au marché. Elle a  une bonne expérience dans ce domaine pour l’avoir pratiqué pendant environs dix ans.

Son nouveau prêt lui permettra  de financer son activité de petit commerce de légumes.

Elle désire soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge sanitaire et alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en:
The Naforé group was created on November 15, 2006 upon the inauguration of the Banc Villageois. It is composed of ten women, all from the same neighborhood. The group members share family ties. Their main activity is small trade.

Mrs. Ndoumbé D. (standing second from the left in the photo, and shown inset at the bottom right) is the group leader. She is 59 years old, married, and the mother of two children.

She sells vegetables and various items both from her home and at the market. With ten years of experience, she has a good command of her activity. 

This new loan will help to bolster her small business of vegetable sales. She wants to help her husband to provide food and health care for their family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, lingerie, nail polish, lip stick, underwear, glitters, powders and treatments.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.es: Rosana, de 40 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Juan de 46 años y sus queridos hijos Katherine de 18 y Jefferson de 13 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Durante 10 años, ella se ha dedicado a la venta de arroz, invirtiendo en las hectáreas sembradas al norte del país, exactamente en la ciudad de Chiclayo, donde las siembras son en mayor proporción y por ende necesitan de una gran inversión. Es por ello que Rosana viaja constantemente dejando a su familia, lo cual le resulta muy difícil ya que ella quisiera estar todo el tiempo con sus pequeños, pero eso no ha sido un obstáculo más bien un impulso para seguir adelante ya que ella sabe que todos esos sacrificios son a favor de sus hijos para que sean unos profesionales. Rosana y su esposo trabajan juntos para que esto se haga realidad y son muy felices porque saben que trabajando muy duro lograrán todos sus objetivos. Es el quinto crédito con MFP y siempre ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores pagos. Los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, los invertirá en la siembra de hectáreas de arroz que tiene en el norte del país para así lograr buenos ingresos.
texts.en: 40-year-old Rosana is a simple and hard-working woman. She lives in her own home along with her 46-year-old husband Juan and her dear children Katherine (18) and Jefferson (13) who she desires to provide with a better quality of life.  For 10 years, she has sold rice, investing in the hectares of cropland in the Northern part of the country, specifically in the city of Chiclayo where the crops are bountiful, and therefore they need large investment.  That is why Rosana travels constantly, leaving her family, which is very difficult as she wishes to be all the time with her little ones. However, this has not been an obstacle; rather it has been motivation to get ahead since she knows that all these sacrifices are for her children, so that they can become professionals. Rosana and her husband work together to make this a reality and are very happy because they know that by working very hard they will achieve their objectives.  This is the fifth loan with MFP and she has always been very punctual with her previous payments.  The two thousand new Peruvian soles requested will be invested in the sowing of hectares of rice that she has in the north of the country to thus obtain good income.

loans.use: to invest in the sowing of hectares of rice in the northern part of the country.

loans.name: Magda Ivania

texts.es: Magda madre soltera, anteriormente trabajaba para el minsa recibe pensión siendo muy poco para mantener su familia. Tiene su propio negocio de manualidades desde hace un tiempo inicio siendo su fuente de recurso económico. Mujer emprendedora, trabajadora ha sabido salir adelante con sus propios esfuerzos. Se le ha presentado dificultades que en momentos que disminuye los trabajos. Su proyecto es dejar un mejor bienestar a su familia. El préstamo que solicitad es para invertirlo en materia prima como: lanas, ajugas, cinta mantequillas entre otros materiales que requiere para elaborar una variedad de trabajos en estos días de celebraciones. Permitiéndole obtener ganancias y ser utilizadas en su negocio.
texts.en: Magda is a single mother. Previously she worked for the Ministry of Health. The pension she receives is very little to support a family.  For awhile now, she has had her own handicrafts business, as her source of income. An entrepreneurial and hard-working woman, she has known how to get ahead by her own effort.  Difficulties have presented themselves that at times reduce the craft works. Her project is to leave her family with greater wellbeing. The requested loan is for investing in raw materials such as: wool, needles and ribbon among other materials required to make a variety of craft works in these days of celebrations, allowing her to make a profit using them in her business.

loans.use: To buy craft materials.

loans.name: Jacob Trust Bank Group

texts.en:
Dora is a humble and kind 36-year-old lady. She is married, but does not have any children. Her husband is a service provider.  She loves trading, especially as a source of livelihood. She sells fish and meat to households and food vendors in her town, Berekum, in northern Ghana. Fish and meat are commonly used animal proteins in the preparation of soups and sauces in many households and food establishments in Ghana. Their trade is, indeed, a lucrative source of income for many women like Dora.  She has sold fish and meat for the past three years. She plans to use the loan to purchase assorted fish and meat in cartons to fill her demand. Dora dreams of one day being able to expand her business and make more profits, even to the point of supporting the poor in her community, and providing her mum with decent accommodation. 

Dora is currently the leader of a five-member trust bank group called Jacob Trust Bank. The other members are neighbors who also trade in various items. Members of the group use peer guarantees to secure their loans, and to provide assistance to one another in times of difficulty to settle their repayments.

loans.use: to purchase assorted fish and meat.

loans.name: Youlta

texts.fr: Coiffeuse de profession a 28 ans, youlta  est mariée à un transitaire et est mère de deux enfants. Elle a démarrée son activité en 2002 en s’approvisionnant de mèches et de tissages à Accra(Ghana), un pays frontalier à l’ouest du TOGO et au SENEGAL. Elle veut équiper son salon de coiffure d’appareils de nouvelle gamme ,ce qui va lui permettre d’avoir plus de clientèle et de majorer son bénéfice pour aider dans l’éducation des enfants.
texts.en: Youlta is a hairdresser by profession. She is married to a freight broker and is mother to two children. She began her business in 2002, getting supplies of hair extensions and weaves in Accra (Ghana), a country which borders the west of Togo and Senegal. She would like to equip her hairdressing salon with a new range of appliances, which will enable her to have more customers and increase her profits, so she can help to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions and weaves

loans.name: Marlyn Lissette

texts.es: Marlín mujer trabajadora casada, su esposo le ayuda con los gasto de la casa, tiene un hijo de corta edad lo tiene estudiando lo principal en sus planes es la profesionalización de su hijo para un mejor futuro y en corto plazo sus planes en mejorar su forma de vida. Su esposo albañil ella tiene su propio negocio de venta de ropa desde hace un tiempo siendo un ingreso más a su hogar. Lo inicio con micro créditos que le ayudaron a obtener una forma de ganar dinero. Con el préstamo comprara mercadería nueva y una nueva variedad de camisas, pantalones, blusas, ropa interior, zapato, perfume entre otros productos. Agradece a la financiera por seguirle apoyando con sus planes  para lograr mayores utilidades y una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Marlín is a hard-working married woman. Her husband helps her with the household expenses. She has a young son who goes to school.  Her principal plan is for her son to become a professional to have a better future, and in the short run her plan is to improve the quality of life. Her husband is a builder.  For awhile now she has had her own business selling clothes, as it is an extra source of income for her home.  She started it with microloans that helped her have a way to earn money.  With the loan she will buy merchandise and a new variety of shirts, pants, blouses, underwear, shoes, and perfumes among other products.  She is grateful to the financer for continuing to support her in her plan to achieve better profits and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of merchandise for women, men and children.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan José tiene 37 años, él es casado y tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica es la de brindar el servicio de barbería. Juan trabaja todos los días desde hace mas de 7 años, cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona en la que vive. El ha proporcionado a su familia los ingresos necesarios para comer todos los días. Juan está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de espuma, navajas, cepillos, peines, máquina para afeitar. Juan es un cliente que cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de las personas que lo conocen. El anhelo de él es de poder brindarle un mejor estilo de vida a su familia día a día.
texts.en: Juan José is 37 years old. He is married and has two children.  His work is that of a barber.  Juan has worked every day for more than 7 years.  He has an already established clientele in the area where he lives.  He has provided his family with the income necessary in order to eat every day.  Juan is seeking a loan to buy shaving cream, blades, combs, brushes and an electric razor. Juan is a client with very good references among the people who know him.  He craves to be able to offer his family a better standard of living day after day.

loans.use: to buy shaving cream, blades, combs, brushes and an electric razor.

loans.name: Akouvi Viviane

texts.fr: Elle est en couple avec un chauffeur et mère d’un enfant. Revendeuse  de maïs  et de charbon de bois, elle s’approvisionne à l’intérieur du pays, puis revend après  à son domicile. Elle a 32 ans et  cherche à apporter de l’aide à son mari dans l’éducation de leur enfant.
texts.en: This lady has a partner who is a driver, and she is mother to one child. She is retailer of corn and charcoal, and she gets her supplies inland, reselling them afterwards from home. She is 32 years old and is looking to help her husband out with their child's education.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and corn

loans.name: Jokker Endam Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Jokker Endam  est créé le 15 Novembre 2006 au jour d’inauguration du banc villageois. Il compte 10 femmes qui vivent dans la même localité. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Bintou  (assise à gauche de la photo, et en médaillon en bas à droite) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 52. Elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants.

Elle vend des légumes dans le marché de son quartier. Elle maîtrise bien cette activité. Elle a en son actif plus de 6 ans  d’expérience.

Ce nouveau  crédit lui permettra d’acheter des légumes pour les revendre dans son marché.

Les bénéfices lui permettront  de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge de la scolarité et santé des enfants.
texts.en:
The Wakilaré group was set up in December 2007. It is made up of ten women who live in the same neighborhood. They get on well together and their main activity is trading on a small scale.

Mrs. D. Ba (who is standing on the extreme right of the photo) is in charge of the group. She is 47 years old, married and mother to seven children.

She has a small business selling vegetables in the market in her neighborhood. She has more than five years' experience in this field. Her new loan will enable her to finance this business. The profits that it generate will allow her to help her husband to provide for their children's schooling and food.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for reselling in her market

loans.name: Yamilet Del Socorro

texts.es:
Tener su propio local en el que pueda vender sus productos es el sueño de Yamilet del Socorro J. C. quien a sus 48 años de edad es una luchadora incansable que desde hace algunos años inició con su negocio ambulante en el que vende salpicones y cremas, entre otros productos a las afueras de un colegio.  

Su negocio le permite sostener su hogar conformado por 5 hijos menores de edad, los cuales dependen de ella y su esposo. Yamilet se ve enfrentada día a día a las dificultades del clima, puesto que por ser una vendedora ambulante el invierno llega a afectar sus ventas. 

Actualmente, esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar su carpa, arreglar su carrito en el que exhibe sus productos y comprar mayor variedad de surtido como frutas, snacks y otros dulces que le permitan incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Yamilet del Socorro J. C. is 48 years old and her dream is to have her own locale in which to sell her products.  She is an untiring fighter who several years ago starting street vending salpicones and cremas (fruit and juice treats), among other products, outside a school.

Her business makes it possible for her to support her home which consists of five minor children who depend on her and her husband.  Yamilet faces daily weather challenges because, as a street vendor, winter affects her sales.

This entrepreneur currently needs a loan to buy a tent, to repair her sales cart that she displays her wares in and to buy a variety of stock items like fruit, snacks and other sweets that will allow her to increase sales.

loans.use: to buy a tent, repair her cart and buy merchandise like fruit, snacks and other sweets.

loans.name: Cristalito Group

texts.es: Griselda Del Rosario, Adela Del Socorro y Alba Luz conforman el grupo solidario Cristalito. Son personas muy responsables y disfrutan de sus negocios, ya que han demostrado salir adelante con las diferentes situaciones que se les han presentado. Adela se dedica a la venta de comida, la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a disfrutar de los deliciosos platillos que ofrece como son gallo pinto, queso frito, maduro, tajaditas, tacos, repochetas, enchiladas entre otros. este credito es parala compra de tortillas, cremas, tomates, cebolla, repollo, aceite, frijoles, arroz, entre otros. Es por eso que se han unido para que cada una pueda obtener financiamientos para sus negocios.
texts.en:
Griselda Del Rosario, Adela Del Socorro and Alba Luz make up the Cristalito communal bank.  They are very responsible people who enjoy their businesses because they’ve demonstrated that they can move ahead from different situations that have presented themselves.

Adela sells food.  Most of her customers come by to enjoy delicious dishes like gallo pinto (rice and beans), fried cheese, plantain, fried plantain, tacos, repochetas (corn quesadillas with slaw on top), and enchiladas, among others.  

She will use this loan to buy tortillas, cream, tomatoes, onions, cabbage, oil, beans and rice, among others.  This is why they’ve come together so that each one can obtain financing for their businesses.

loans.use: to buy tortillas, cream, tomatoes, onions, cabbage, oil, beans and rice, among others.

loans.name: Berenice

texts.es:
A sus 68 años de edad, Berenice B. P. oriunda de la ciudad de Medellín es una emprendedora que con gran esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante y conseguir lo básico para sobrevivir. Con una energía inagotable pues, soltera y sin familia y con la necesidad de generar ingresos, Berenice decidió montar en su casa una pensión estudiantes para estudiantes que vienen de otras ciudades o municipios y que necesitan un lugar donde vivir y una persona que les arregle la ropa y les elabore los alimentos. 

Aunque su jornada laboral es extenuante, se siente feliz de trabajar y valerse por si misma, así como prestarle un servicio a estos estudiantes que no tienen un lugar a donde llegar. 

Berenice espera seguir prestando este servicio y para ello necesita de un préstamo para comprar 3 camas con sus respectivos colchones, cobijas y tendidos de cama, con el fin de ampliar su inmobiliario y poder hospedar nuevos inquilinos lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
At 68 years old, Berenice B. P. - a native of the city of Medellín - is an entrepreneur who, through a lot of effort, has managed to get ahead in life and acquire the basics she needs to survive.  With untiring energy (she is single, doesn't have any family and needs to make income) Berenice decided to set up in her home a guesthouse for students from other towns and cities who need a place to live and somebody to take care of their clothes and make their meals.

Although her working day is exhausting, Berenice feels happy to be working and looking after herself as well as providing a service to the students who don't have a place to live.

Berenice hopes to continue providing this service.  She needs a loan to buy three beds, each with a mattress and bedclothes, so that she can expand her furnishings and thereby be able to provide more tenants with accommodations.  This will allow her to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy three beds each with a mattress and bedclothes

loans.name: Cipriana

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “SUMAC TIKA-VALLE SAGRADO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Qotohuycho, perteneciente a la Provincia de Urubamba, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Cipriana, la socia tiene 40 años de edad;  la socia es casada, la socia tiene 6 hijos de 23, 23, 17, 14, 12, 10 años de edad; la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con su pequeño negocio de venta de comida en el grifo principal de Urubamba; la socia elabora diferente potajes y los lleva en sus ollas especiales al grifo a vender sobre una carreta, ella tieen ya sus clientes que la buscan todos los días y le compran sus paltos típicos, la socia requiere el crédito para poder comprar insumos al por mayor tales como de preferencia, aceite, arroz, papa, fideos, queso, verduras y otros para poder cocinar en casa, a la socia le apoyan sus hijas y ella revierte lo que ingresa a su bolsa del hogar en la educación y alimentación de sus hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos y elaborar sus platillos para la venta.

La  socia se encuentra agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called "Sumac Tika-Valle Sagrado". It is located in the community of Qotohuycho, belonging to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Cipriana. She is 40 years old, married, and she has 6 children, aged, 23, 23, 17, 14, 12, and 10. She alternates her daily household activities with her small catering business in the downtown of Urubamba. She makes different foods and she takes them on her special pots to the area to sell on a wheelbarrow. She already has clients who look for her everyday to buy the traditional meals. She requests a loan to purchase ingredients in wholesale, such as cooking oil, rice, potatoes, pasta, cheese, vegetables, and other ingredients to be able to cook at home. Her daughters help her and she disburses what she earns to the household fund to provide the education and support of her children. She has requests a loan to purchase ingredients to prepare her foods for sale. 

She is thankful and she wants to underline that she will commit to her loan payments in a responsible manner.

loans.use: to purchase the ingredients that she needs to prepare foods to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
Rosa es un cliente de 38 años de edad, vive con su madre y hermana  en el distrito de Jayanca – Lambayeque. La actividad principal de esta comunidad es la agricultura y crianza de animales. También existen restaurantes campestres conocidos, por su buena sazón, alrededor de la ciudad. Sin embargo, la actividad a la que se dedica Rosa es la venta de ropa.

Desde hace 1 año Rosa se dedica a la compra y venta de prendas de vestir en los distintos sectores de la ciudad de Jayanca. Éste negocio le ha traído nuevas  satisfacciones, ya que es un negocio adicional al trabajo que ella desempeña para una empresa. 

Rosa ya cuenta con clientela fija en su zona y es por ello que desea ampliar su negocio. Rosa solicita un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para invertirlo en la compra de prendas de vestir y calzado, que sus clientes están esperando. Este será  uno de los primeros pasos que Rosa dará para expandir su negocio y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 38 year old woman who lives with her mother and sister in the district of Jayanca, Lambayeque. The principal activity in this community is agriculture and livestock farming. There are also country restaurants around the city that are well-known for their delicious recipes.
But Rosa's business is clothing sales.

For the past year Rosa has been buying and selling articles of clothing in the different sectors of the city of Jayanca. This business has brought her new satisfaction, especially because it is an additional business to her employment in a company. 

Rosa has a stable client base in the region and for this reason she wants to expand her business. Rosa requests a loan of 1500 neuvos soles to invest in the purchase of clothing and shoes, items which are being requested by her clients. This will be one of the first steps Rosa will take to expand her business and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase articles of clothing and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es:
Marvin V. V., tiene la edad de 39 años de edad, está casado  y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con su crédito comprar los alimentos necesarios para poder engordar sus animales para su posterior venta el mercado loca. El ya tiene los animales a su poder lo q necesita es el concentrado para poder sacarlos gordos para la temporada de venta. El pretende generar ganancias y también ampliar el proyecto donde el tenga la cría y su posterior engorde para darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia con las ganancias que pueda obtener de este proyecto.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marvin V. V. is 39 years old, married, and he lives with his 3 children and his wife, all of whom are his greatest priority. With his loan he plans on purchasing the feed that he needs to fatten his livestock for later resale at the local market. He already has the livestock but what he needs is concentrated feed to be able to fatten them for the sales season. He expects to generate a profit and to expand his business to have the livestock to raise and fatten. He will be able to provide is family with a better quality of life with the help of the profits he will earn from his project.

It is the first loan that he has received from Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). He has not had previous loans from state-run banks, but Fudecosur has provided him with a loan with greater ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase feed for his livestock.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
Ysabel tiene 55 años de edad está casada y tiene un hijo del cual se encarga junto con su esposo. Ellos viven en un caserío (comunidad rural de condición pobre, con casas en desarrollo) ubicado en el distrito de Tambogrande – Piura. La actividad principal en este distrito es la agricultura y la ganadería.

Su esposo es agricultor con parcela propia, en la cual cuenta con mango y algodón que ha sembrado para esta campaña.

Ysabel se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino-vacuno-porcino, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 10 años, contando con corrales apropiados y espaciosos. Ysabel vende sus ovejas y cerdos cuando estos han alcanzado el  tamaño y peso ideal. Además vende la leche de sus vacas. Sus ventas son realizadas en el mercado local 

Ysabel solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que destinará para la implementación de un corral para cerdos y para la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales.

Ysabel cuenta con  buenas referencias personales y un historial crediticio óptimo.
texts.en:
Ysabel is 55 years old, married, and she has a son that she supports together with her husband. They live in a community (a poor rural community where the housing is under development) and it is located in the district of Tambogrande, Piura. The principal business activities in the district are agriculture and farming. 

Her husband is an agriculturist who works on his own parcel of land. This season he has sown mango and cotton.

Ysabel raises sheep, cows, and pigs. She has had this business for 10 years and she has her own corrals and spaces. Ysabel sells her sheep and pigs when they have reached an ideal size and weight. She also sells the milk from her cows. She carries out her sales at the local market.

Ysabel requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) a loan in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles and she will use it to set up a corral for her pigs and to purchase balanced feed.

Ysabel has good personal references and an excellent credit history.

loans.use: to set up a corral and to purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Sully

texts.es: Sully casada, su esposo es comerciante, tiene un hijo está estudiando, mujer emprendedora tiene un comedor desde hace un tiempo lo inicio con ayuda de su suegra ahora lo tiene ella, requiere mejorar las condiciones del local para ofrecerles mayores comodidad, el préstamo será invertido en la compra de materia prima como: arroz, frijoles, aceite, sal, mantequillas, carne de res, pollo y cerdo, verduras y otros productos.  Agradece a la financiera por su apoyo al desarrollo de su familia.
texts.en: Sully is married and her husband is a merchant. One of her sons is studying. She is an enterprising woman who has had her restaurant for some time. She started out with the help of her mother-in-law. She needs to recondition her store to provide her clients with greater comfort. The loan will be invested in the purchase of ingredients such as: rice, beans, cooking oil, salt, butter, beef, chicken, and pork, vegetables and other products. She is thankful to the organization for the support received for the development of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia tiene su negocio que es la venta de zapatos. Tiene más  de 4 años trabajando en esta actividad, la ubicación es en su vivienda en donde asisten una buena cantidad de clientes. Por lo que tiene que trabajar todos los días ya que la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le solicitan variedad en los diferentes zapatos que ofrece. Inicio este medio de vida porque no tenía los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de zapatos deportivos, zapatillas, botas, pantuflas, sandalias, calzado para niño entre otros.
texts.en:
Virginia sells shoes.  She’s been in the business for over 4 years.  Her sales take place at home where a good number of customers come by. Because of this, she has to work every day since most of her customers always request a variety of different shoes from her.  

She started this way of life because she did not have sufficient income to meet household expenses.  

She is, therefore, asking for this loan to buy athletic shoes, slippers, boots, sandals, loafers and children’s shoes, among others.

loans.use: to buy athletic shoes, sandals, boots, slippers, loafers and children's shoes, among others.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jose es un poblador del distrito de Eten ubicado en Chiclayo, el tiene 36 años de edad y vive con su esposa, quien es costurera y con su mejor hijo. La esposa de Jose lo ayuda económicamente con el trabajo que desempeña desde su domicilio, todo por el bienestar de su familia.

Desde hace 10 años, Jose ofrece el servicio de renovadora de calzado, el cuenta con una gran experiencia en su trabajo y tiene un puesto (el cual alquila) en las calles de Monsefú – Lambayeque. Jose es muy conocido en la zona y eso se refleja en la gran cantidad de clientes que requieren de su servicio.

Jose solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles, que desea invertir en la compra de productos para su negocio como cuero, suelas, hilo y pegamento; pero sobretodo en la compra de un esmeril (especie de lija que utilizan los zapateros para cortar cuero).

Jose sólo ha trabajado con  Edpyme Alternativa y los créditos que nuestra institución le han brindado los ha cancelado de forma puntual.
texts.en:
José lives in Eten District in Chiclayo.  He’s 36 years old and lives with his wife, who’s a Seamstress, and with their minor son.  José’s wife helps him economically with the work she does at home for the family’s wellbeing.

For the last ten years José has been a Shoe Repairman.  He has a lot of experience in this kind of work and has a stand (which he leases) on a street in Monsefú-Lambayeque.  José is very well known in the area and this is reflected in the large number of customers that request his services.

José is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan to buy supplies for his business like:  leather, soles, thread and adhesives but, above all, to buy an “esmeril” (a type of emery file used by shoemakers to cut leather).

José has only worked with Edpyme Alternativa and the loans our institution has granted him have been repaid punctually.

loans.use: to buy a leather cutter and work tools.

loans.name: Cruz Maria

texts.es:
Cruz tiene  26 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos menores hijos en una casa propia ubicada en el asentamiento humano (comunidad en desarrollo, de condición pobre) San Martín de Porres de la ciudad de Tambogrande- Piura. Los vecinos de Cruz consideran que ésta es una buena persona y que su familia es muy unida.

El esposo de Cruz se dedica a labores de agricultura, aportando con sus ingresos al sostenimiento familiar. Mientras que Cruz se dedica a vender producto comestibles en una bodega ubicada en su propia casa. Ella cuenta con una clientela ya estable, que son los pobladores de su zona. Además, cuenta con 3 años de experiencia en este negocio.

Cruz solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra de 1 lote de mercadería en artículos de primera necesidad (leche, agua, azúcar, aceite, arroz, huevos) para surtir más su negocio e incrementar sus ventas y así seguir creciendo económicamente.

Cruz  es una clienta conocida  de Edpyme Alternativa, tiene un buen historial crediticio.
texts.en:
Cruz, 26, lives with her husband and two minor children in her own house located in the San Martín de Porres Asentamiento Humano (a community in development, in poor condition) in the city of Tambogrande-Piura.  Cruz’s neighbors consider her to be a good person and that her family is very unified.

Cruz’s husband works in farming and contributes income to family support while Cruz sells groceries in a store located in her home.  She has a stable clientele among residents in her area.  Besides, she has three years experience in this business.

Cruz is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan that she’ll use to buy a lot of groceries (milk, water, sugar, oil, rice, eggs) to stock her store and increase sales to continue growing economically.

Cruz is a well-known client of Edpyme Alternativa and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy a lot of groceries.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto es un padre de familia de 34 años de edad. Él vive con su esposa e hijos en casa de sus padres, ubicada en la zona rural de la provincia de Áscope en el departamento de La Libertad.

Los vecinos de Carlos Alberto lo consideran una persona trabajadora y responsable, que daría todo por el bienestar de su familia.

Carlos Alberto cuenta con dos años de experiencia brindando el servicio de mototaxi (la mototaxi es un servicio de transporte público muy común en el Perú, sobretodo en las pequeñas comunidades; consta de una moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros), en su propio vehículo. 

Él solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que necesita para la reparación y mantenimiento de rodajes y carpas de su moto.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is a 34-year old father of a family. He lives with his wife and children in his parents' house. It is located in the rural region in the province of Ascope in the department of La Libertad. 

Carlos Alberto's neighbors consider him to be a hardworking and responsible person who would give everything for the well-being of his family. 

Carlos Alberto has two years' experience in providing motorcycle rickshaw service (the motorcycle rickshaw is a public transportation service that is very common in Peru, especially in the small communities. It consists of a motorcycle and a cabin in the rear where passengers are transported). He has his own vehicle.

He requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles to repair and maintain the tires and awning of his vehicle.

loans.use: to repair and maintain the tires and awning of his vehicle.

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es:
José Francisco S. Sequiera, tiene la edad de 51 años de edad, está casado, vive con sus 4 hijos y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el dinero realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia de la siembra de papa chiricana y pagar la mano de obra que esta devenga. El  lo que pretende es aumentar la producción de esta cosecha y generar los ingresos para el bienestar diario del sustento de su familia.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja
texts.en:
José Francisco S. Sequiera, 51, is married living with his four children and his wife who are his greatest priority.   He intends to use the money to buy supplies for his Chiricana variety of potato crop and to pay labor costs associated with it.  He intends to increase its production and generate income for his family’s daily wellbeing and support.

This is the first loan he’s gotten from FUDECOSUR.  He hadn’t had any previous loans with state banking institutions but FUDECOSUR has provided the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Alberta

texts.es:
Alberta  es una madre de 45  años de edad, casada y con dos hijos menores de edad uno de ellos en edad escolar. Actualmente vive en el caserío Lagartera,  ubicado a 20 minutos  de la ciudad de Mórrope –Lambayeque. Esta es una comunidad rural muy pequeña donde viven aproximadamente 500 familias.

Alberta se gana la vida desde hace 4  años criando animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, que luego comercializa a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive. Alberta suele criar ganado porcino, ovino  así como  pavos y patos. Esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres desde que era pequeña, así que conoce el rubro a la perfección.  

Asimismo, tiene una pequeña bodega donde vende abarrotes.  Esta bodega está ubicada en su domicilo, allí atiende a su clientela con la amabilidad que la caracteriza.

Alberta solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de  3000 nuevos soles que invertirá en su negocio. En comprar más aves de corral y por supuesto en el alimento balanceado para éstas y para sus ganados ovinos y porcinos.

Alberta desea ampliar su negocio y comercializar sus animales, no sólo en su zona, ella quiere mejorar su calidad de vida. Cuenta con un buen historial crediticio en Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Alberta is a 45 year old, married mother of two minor children one of whom is school age.  She currently lives in Lagartera located 20 minutes from the city of Mórrope-Lambayeque.  This is a very small rural community where approximately 500 families live.

Alberta has earned a living raising small farm animals for the last 4 years.  They are corralled in her back yard.  She then sells them to merchants that always come by the area where she lives.  Alberta tends to raise pigs, sheep, turkeys and ducks.  She learned this activity from her parents while still a little girl so she knows the line of work to perfection.

Alberta asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 3000 new sol loan to invest in her business buying more barnyard fowl and, of course, nutritionally balanced feed for them and for her sheep and pigs.

Alberta wants to expand her business and sell her animals not only in her own area.  She wants to improve her quality of life.  She has a good credit history with Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy barnyard fowl and nutritionally balanced feed.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “SUMAC TIKA-VALLE SAGRADO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Poblado de Qotohuycho, perteneciente a la Provincia de Urubamba, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Concepción, la socia tiene 29 años de edad;  la socia es casada, la socia tiene 4 hijos de 12, 11, 9, 10 meses de edad; la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la crianza de animales menores, la socia cría pollos para la venta, la socia se encarga de comprar pollos al por mayor los cría alimenta, y luego los vende al por mayor, ella también tiene gallinas y las crías de estas también son incluidas apara la venta. La socia en esta ocasión comprara una docena de pollos para incrementar sus ganancias, ella tiene pensado vender en solo este mes 40 pollos y seguir comprando varias docenas gradualmente. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de pollos.

La socia agradece el prestamo que le otorgaran y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called “SUMAC TIKA-VALLE SAGRADO” and is located in Qotohuycho which belongs to Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.

Concepción, 29, is the member.  She’s married and has four children who are 12, 11, 9 and 10 months of age.  She alternates her household chores with raising small farm animals.  She raises chickens to sell.  She buys chicks at wholesale, feeds them and then sells them at wholesale.  She also has chickens and she also includes their chicks in the sales.

On this occasion she will buy a dozen chickens to increase her profits.  She plans to sell 40 chickens this month and continue buying dozens more gradually.  She is asking for the loan to buy chickens.

The client is grateful for the loan and is committed to paying her installments in the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel es un padre joven de  28 años de edad,  vive con su novia y su pequeña niña de 3 años de edad. Ellos viven en casa de los padres de Daniel, quienes son agricultores y en algunas épocas del año realizan esta labor en la sierra de Cajamarca. La casa donde vive Daniel y su familia se encuentra en la zona rural del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz (un distrito conocido por ser zona de comerciantes) en Chiclayo.

Daniel tiene varios años de experiencia trabajando en el área de transportes. Él cuenta con una mototaxi (la mototaxi es un servicio de transporte público muy común en el Perú, sobretodo en las pequeñas comunidades; consta de una moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros), con la cual da un servicio dentro de su distrito.

Sin embargo el crédito que solicita Daniel, no es para invertirlo en su trabajo sino es para mejorar los servicios básicos de su hogar.

Daniel solicita un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles, a Edpyme Alternativa, que necesita para realizar las instalaciones de agua y desagüe en su casa.

Daniel siempre ha trabajado con Edpyme Alternativa, comenzando con créditos pequeños que le ayudaron en su  negocio  y ahora éste préstamo le servirá para mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Daniel, 28, is a father living with his girlfriend and 3-year-old daughter.  They live in Daniel’s parents’ house.  His parents are farmers and sometimes during the year work in the Cajamarca Mountains.  The house where Daniel and his family live is located in a rural area of José Leonardo Ortiz district in Chiclayo, a district known for having many merchants.

Daniel has several years experience working in transportation.  He has a mototaxi (transportation vehicle that’s very common in Perú, especially in small communities, consisting of a motorcycle with an attached cabin in the rear in which passengers can be transported) that he uses to provide transportation services in his district.

However, the loan Daniel is asking for isn’t going to be used to invest in his business but, rather, is to improve his home’s basic utilities.

Daniel is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan that he needs to install water and sewage services at home.

Daniel has always worked with Edpyme Alternativa starting out with small loans that helped him in his business and now this loan will be useful for him to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to install water and sewage utilities at home.

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
Hermelinda es una madre D. familia D. 46 años D. edad, vive con su esposo y 2 hijas en el caserío Viviano Espinoza que se encuentra a 15 minutos del distrito Las Lomas y a una hora D. distancia del departamneto D. Piura, tiene casa propia, pero no cuenta con los servicios básicos.  Esta zona  se caracteriza por tener una mucha actividad agricola, ganadera, artesanía y turismo .

Hermelinda ha acondicionado la sala D. su casa para poner un pequeña tienda para vender productos D. belleza y ropa, ésta actividad lo realiza desD. hace unos 10 años, tiene su propia clientela que le hace pedidos.  Estos productos es para que las personas D. todas las edades mejoren su imagen personal,  con estos ingresos se ayuda para sacar adelante a sus hijas  junto con su esposo.

A solicitado Hermelinda a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1600 nuevos soles para surtir su negocio con mercadería novedosa tanto en productos D. belleza como ropa, ya que en ese caserío son pocas las personas  que se dedican a este rubro, lo que le permite tener exito en su negocio y cada vez cresca más. Con los ingresos D. la venta D. todos sus productos cubriría las cuotas del crédito brindado y mejoraría la calidad D. vida D. su familia.

Hermelinda es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, alegre, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a su familia (esposo e hijos).
texts.en:
Hermelida is a 46 year old mother living with her husband and two daughters in Viviano Espinoza located 15 minutes from the Las Lomas District and an hour away from Piura Department.  She owns her house but it lacks basic utilities.  This zone is noted for having much framing, livestock raising, crafts and tourism activities.

Hermelinda has turned her living room into a small store to sell beauty products and clothes.  She’s been doing this for the last 10 years.  She has her own clientele that places orders.  These products are so that people of all ages can improve their personal appearance.  Income helps her and her husband support their daughters.

Hermelinda has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1600 new sol loan to stock her business with novel merchandise both in beauty products and clothes because there are few people in her hamlet who are in this kind of business which permits her to have a successful business that grown more each time.  She will use income from the sale of all her products to cover payment of the granted loan and to improve her family’s quality of life.

Hermelinda is very well known for being a hard working, cheerful, responsible woman who is a good mother wishing to proviD. a better future for her family (husband and children).

loans.use: to buy larger amounts of merchandise (beauty products and clothes).

loans.name: G.s. Buenaventura Group

texts.es: Ayda Ruth, Evelia y Antonio conforman el grupo solidario Buenaventura. Evelia se dedica a una pulpería, hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Ella tiene mucha experiencia con sus clientes, ya que ellos siempre están buscando variedad en sus productos pues son vecinos que les gusta mucho la atención que brinda Evelia. Ha demostrado ser una persona que disfruta de su actividad y que se encuentra al tanto de lo que sus clientes le solicitan. Este financiamiento es para la compra de golosinas, detergentes, sopas, pastas, refrescos, pan, enlatados, galletas y grano básicos.
texts.en: Ayda Ruth, Evelia and Antonio make up the Buenaventura solidarity group.  Evelia owns a grocery store.  She has had her business for more than 10 years.   She has two dependent children in her care.  Evelia has a lot of experience with her customers who are always looking for variety in her products.  They are neighbors who really like the service that Evelia provides.  She has shown herself to be a person who enjoys her business and who is aware of what her customers are requesting.  She will use this loan to buy candies, detergents, soups, pasta, soft drinks, bread, canned goods, cookies and basic grains.

loans.use: to buy candies, detergents, soups, pasta, soft drinks, bread, canned goods, cookies and basic grains

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María Magdalena Zúñiga M., tiene la edad de 29 años, está casada, vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo que son sus mayores prioridades. Ella pretende con el crédito compra pollos para su posterior engorde y el alimento para su mantenimiento. Ella lo que quiere es establecer una pequeña granjita donde pueda obtener  ganancias y así tener mas ingresos para sus bienestar. Su meta es crecer con la idea y establecer su granja para la producción de pollos y generar ingresos para su crecimiento día  a día y el mantén de su familia.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: María Magdalena Zúñiga M. is 29 years old, married, and lives with her two children and husband who are her main priorities.  She plans to use her loan to buy chickens to fatten and feed for these chickens.  What María would like to do is to set up a small farm where she can earn profits and thereby make more income for her family's well-being.  Her goal is to set up her chicken farm and make income every day for her day-to-day growth and the support of her family.  This is the first loan that María has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has provided her with this loan which has better repayment terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes and groceries for her store

loans.name: Jhon Jenny

texts.es:
Jhon es un joven emprendedor de 21 años de edad. Desde muy pequeño, Jhon, se destacó por ser una persona hacendosa y con voluntad para ayudar a los demás. Es por eso que sus vecinos le tienen mucho cariño y estima y lo consideran una persona trabajadora y responsable.

Jhon vive en casa de sus padres, en una comunidad rural en el distrito de Paiján ubicado en la provincia de Áscope - La Libertad.

Hace un año Jhon compró una mototaxi (moto con una cabina en la parte trasera  donde se pueden transportar pasajeros) que hoy en día es su herramienta de trabajo. Lamentablemente la moto de Jhon le ha estado dando inconvenientes debido a su falta de mantenimiento. Esto le ha restado clientela a Jhon, quien brinda este servicio dentro de su zona. 

Jhon solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para reparar su moto.  Arreglando sus rodajes y comprándole una carpa nueva.
texts.en:
Jhon is an enterprising young man of 21.  Since he was a young boy, Jhon has stood out as a hard-working person who has a desire to help other people.  For this reason, his neighbors are very fond of him, think highly of him and consider him to be a hard-working and responsible person.

Jhon lives in his parents' home, in a rural community in Paiján district, in Áscope province - La Libertad.

One year ago, Jhon bought a motorcycle taxi (a motorbike with a cabin in back for transporting passengers) which is currently his work tool.  Unfortunately, Jhon's motorbike is causing him problems owing to a lack of maintenance.  This has meant that Jhon, who provides a service in his area, has lost customers.

Jhon is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa with which to repair his motorbike, fixing his wheels and buying a new roof (canopy) for his vehicle.

loans.use: to fix the wheels of his vehicle and buy a new roof (canopy)

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
Martina es una madre de familia  de 31 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo e hijos, es de material rústico (adobe), cuenta solamente con servicio de luz, ubicada en el caserío Santa Rosa de Curvan a unos 10 minutos de distrito de Tambgrande  y a 40 minutos del  departamento de  Piura.  Todas esta zonas se dedica ha la actividad agricola,  ganadera y turismo.

Martina ha puesto  en su domilcilio su tienda de productos de primera necesidad (leche, azúcar, arroz, azúcar, todo tipo de golosinas, etc.),  para seguridad y comodidad de ella y de algún modo pueda atender a cualquier hora a sus  clientes, en la cual  encuentran todo lo que necesitan para su uso diario, con el negocio que a colocado trata en lo posible de que sus clientes estén satisfechos y por ende brindar un mejor nivel de vida para su familia.

Mediante una visita a Edpyme Alternativa Martina trata de adquirir un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles para abastecer su tienda de más insumos y así pueda satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, con la finalidad de incrementar  sus ingresos.  

Martina es conocida por sus vecinos, por ser una mujer  alegre, dispuesta a ayudar a otros y una madre que tiene como  objetivo que su familia salga adelante a punta de esfuerzo y trabajo.
texts.en:
Martina is a 31 year-old mother who lives in her own home together with her husband and children.  Her house is made from basic building materials (adobe) and only has electricity.  It is located in the small village of Santa Rosa de Curvan, 10 minutes from Tambogrande district and 40 minutes from Piura department.  In all these areas, locals work in agriculture, livestock raising and tourism.

Martina has set up a grocery store, where she sells milk, sugar, rice, all sorts of candies, etc, in her home.  She did this for her own safety and comfort and also so that she could serve her customers at any hour of the day.  In her store, her customers find everything they need to use on a daily basis.  Martina tries to ensure that her customers are happy with her business and, as a consequence, she is able to provide her family with a better standard of living.

Martina visited Edpyme Alternativa to acquire a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles so that she could stock her store with more supplies and thereby meet her customers' needs and increase her income.

Martina is known by her neighbors as being a cheerful woman who is ready to help others.  She is also known as a mother whose goal is to get her family ahead in life through her efforts and hard work.

loans.use: to buy more supplies for her business

loans.name: Vilma Estela

texts.es:
Vilma tiene  37 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo e hija. Ellos viven en la parte urbana del  distrito Tambogrande  en Piura. 

Su esposo es contador público y Vilma se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y productos de belleza, en su propio domicilio y entregando pedidos a clientes conocidos. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de un año. 

Vilma solicita un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa que destinará en la compra de cosméticos de mejor calidad para su negocio. 

Esto satisfará las necesidades de sus clientes y le permitirá a Vilma tener un mayor número de ventas y así ampliar su negocio con lo que podrá ayudar a su esposo en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Vilma is 37 years old and lives in her own home together with her husband and daughter.  They live in the urban part of Tambogrande district, in Piura.

Vilma's husband is a certified public accountant.  Vilma sells cosmetics and beauty products in her own home and also delivers orders to already-known customers.  She has been in this business for more than one year.

Vilma is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the money to buy better-quality cosmetics for her business.  This will satisfy her customers' needs and allow Vilma to make more sales and thereby expand her business.  This will enable her to help her husband with their family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy better-quality cosmetics

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel Agüero Rodríguez, tiene la edad de 27 años, está en Unión libre, vive con sus 4 hijos y su señora que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el dinero realizar la compra de los alimentos para el engorde de sus animales. El quiere crecer en el negocio  cada día y generar las ganancias para bienestar familiar  y crecer como un gran productor de cerdos para la carne. Su meta es creer con le proyecto y seguir adelante con su negocio y asi cada dia fortalecerlo para su crecimiemto.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Manuel Agüero Rodríguez is 27 years old and has a common-law marriage.  He lives with his wife and four children who are his main priorities.  He plans to use his money to buy feed for fattening his animals.  He would like to grow in his business, make profits for the good of his family, and grow as an important pig producer who raises animals for meat.  His goal is to continue moving forward in his business and strengthen and grow it every day.

This is Manuel's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't received any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to look after and fatten his pigs

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Rust Abigail

texts.es:
Rust de 27 años es madre defamilia, vive en casa propia con su esposo e hijos, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en el caserío el Papayo del Algarrobo que pertence al distrito de Tambogrande, que se encuentra a unos 40 minutos de distancia del departamento de Piura.  Las cuales  se caracterizan por la actividad agricola, ganadera, artesana de sus pobladores.

Rust se dedica a la venta de ropa, negocio que a colocado en su domicilio desde hace unos 3 años, a parte de la venta de ropa también vende algunos productos comestibles, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar losgastos familiares.

Al observar Rust que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creido necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadría y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, de una manera responsable  con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo.
texts.en:
Rust, age 27, is homemaker and lives in her own house with her husband and children.  The only utility she has is electricity since she lives in the rural community of Papayo del Algarrobo which is in the district of Tambogrande, about 40 minutes from the department of Piura.  In this area most of the locals are involved in agriculture, livestock farming and crafts.

Rust sells clothing for a living and began the business three years ago in her home.  She also sells some food products to attract more customers and increase her income to cover household expenses.

Having observed that her business gets more profitable each day, Rust thought it was a good idea to request a loan in the amount of 1,200 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa so she can buy more merchandise and stock her store with innovative products.  This way her customer base will grow so she can pay off her loan and improve her family's lifestyle, in a responsible manner with considerable effort and hard work.

loans.use: To buy more clothing merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make sweets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a kiosk.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Femme d’un chauffeur et maman de 03 enfants, Afi  a 43 ans et exerce une activité de revendeuse de condiments de premières nécessité à savoir  le piment ,de la tomate fraîche………elle fait cette activité depuis 1990 et par ce second crédit voudrait associer un peu d’alimentation générale(riz ,huile végétale…..).
