Her customers include community members from her region. Lakrima says that she is passionate about her work and that she can not imagine life without it. 

She believes that her business draws a smile to the face of everyone who gets a gift; she also sells stationery and some useful household items. 

She is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua. This will be her third loan from Al Majmoua. She is planning to increase her store's inventory with the loan. She says that, without the loan, she would not be able to provide the same level of support for her family. In the future, Lakrima is hoping to further expand and develop her business.

loans.use: To increase her gift inventory.

loans.name: Siyazama Group

texts.en:
Sizakele (pictured on the far right in a white shirt) is a 53-year-old woman. She and her husband have two children who are 17 and 22. They currently attend school.

She runs a retail business in Kwa Zulu Natal of Emandini in South Africa and sells live chickens and cold drinks at her home. She explains that she has been in this business for three years. Her main business challenge is dealing with customers who do not want to pay on time after they purchase on credit, and facing the death of chickens when it's very hot or cold. 

She requested this loan through Women’s Development Businesses (WDB) and Kiva to buy live chickens and cold drinks. She will use the extra income to send her children to tertiary. In the future, she sees her business growing and having a farm. 

She commented that it would be good if WDB could give them money on an individual basis because groups give problems of delaying payment while she has finished her last repayment and wants to borrow money again.

loans.use: To buy live chickens and cold drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy peppers, flour, palm oil, rice, etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Jeremiah Trust Bank Group

texts.en:
Martin is currently the group leader of Jeremiah Trust bank Group made up of 6 members. Martin is clearly a hard worker. He is a 43 year old electric welder. He does steel and aluminum fabrication work like steel gates, burglar proof gates, mini bus seats, etc. for customers on request. He plans to use the loan to purchase aluminum and steel plates to improve his work. Martin possesses 11 years hands on experience in steel and aluminum fabrication. 

Martin is married to a woman who is a service provider and together they have two children. He lives with his family in Berekum, northern part of Ghana. Martin has a good heart to support the poor in society. Above all, he hopes to be financially able to support his family and also provide a university education for his children. As the leader of the group, Martin ensures that all members attend meetings and submit their repayments.

loans.use: To purchase steel and aluminum sheets.

loans.name: Soukaina

texts.en:
Soukaina is a 42-year old married woman, mother of two children. Soukaina has been the owner of a grocery store since 2002. She is well known in the region and most of her clients are surrounding citizens. Soukaina is a hard worker. She states that her business is very important for her family's continuity. 
Soukaina has requested a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, in order to buy special summer offers on soft drinks, ice cream. These offerings will help increase her income.

This is Soukaina's 6th cycle with Al Majmoua.  She is a borrower in good standing  and all her previous loans were invested in her business for the sake of improving her family's financial situation.

Soukaina hopes to improve her business more in the future, and to stay capable of helping her family instead of asking for charity from others..

loans.use: To buy special offers for the summer season

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Зайнидинова Сайёра жительница района Вахдат. Ей 26 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Её муж занимается строительными работами по найму. Сама Сайёра уже 4 года как занимается животноводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Целью кредита является закуп скота.
texts.en: Sayora Z. lives in Vahdat. She is 26 years old, married, and has two children. Her husband is a day laborer working in construction.  Sayora has been working in animal husbandry for four years.  She raises cattle for later sale. She is taking out a loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a motorbike

loans.name: Jane Njeri

texts.en:
Jane Njeri Kamani is 42 years old, married with three children. Her spouse contributes to the family income. He has been running his water kiosk for a period of about 10 years with an income of 14,000 Kenya shillings a month.

This is Jane's first loan with KADET LTD after being introduced to KADET by a staff member. She wants to help her husband's business by using the loan to open another water tap. Their goal is to distribute water in the whole of Thika town.

loans.use: To open another water tap.

loans.name: Nthambi

texts.en:
Nthambi N. is married to Jimmy and they do not have any children yet. She has been running a retail shop for the last four years and earns an income of KES.17,000 in a month.

Nthambi is applying for her fourth loan which she intends to use to buy a new stock of goods like bar soaps, bags of washing powder, sugar, cooking oil and flour for resale. With the anticipated profits she will reinvest in her business.

In the future Nthambi desires to grow her business and own a big shop. She is a very hardworking lady.

loans.use: to buy bar soaps, bags of washing powder , sugar,cooking oil and flour.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cosmetics and torch lights in large quantity to add to his current ones

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles W. M. has been selling charcoal for about five years and earns KES.15,000 per month. He is married to Mary Mueni.
	
He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer and he is applying for his second loan of KES.20,000, with which he plans to add more stock of charcoal for sale. 
	
In the future, he plans to grow his business and own a wholesale shop. He is a hardworking gentleman.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal for resale

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 51 years old, married to Elisabeth, and does not have children. He owns a retail shop.  He has been in this business for four years and earns a profit margin of KES.20,000 per month.

He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer and he is applying for his fifth loan of KES. 50,000.  He plans to buy more items such as cooking oil, flour, sugar, bread, and tea leaves for sale. He has paid his previous loans well and in good time.

In the future, he intends to grow his business and own a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy more stock, e.g., cooking oil, flour, sugar, bread and tea leaves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more glass chimneys to sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph K. M. has been selling clothes for about two years and earns about $175 per month. He is married to Salome who is a business lady, and they do not have children yet.
	
He was introduced to KADET LTD by a group already registered with KADET and he is applying for his second loan of 15,000 KES which he plans to use to add more stock of secondhand clothes for resale.

In future he plans to grow his business and own a boutique where he will be selling clothes wholesale.

loans.use: to buy more secondhand clothes for resale.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 28 ans, Mme Adjo est mère d’un enfant et couturière  de profession. Son conjoint est magasinier. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour l’achat d’une machine pour plinthe  car aimerait parfaire ses finitions. Elle est dans ce métier depuis 04 ans. Toute son activité est basée sur place. Elle aimerait plus tard créer sa propre marque de vêtement et se faire connaître à l’international.
texts.en: Married and aged 28, Mrs. Adjo is the mother of one child and a trained seamstress. Her husband is a storekeeper. She is requesting this loan to buy a specialty sewing machine for hems because she would like to be able to finish her clothing herself. She has been in this trade for four years. All her business is done right where she lives. Later on, she would like to create her own trademark for clothing and be known internationally.

loans.use: to buy a specialty sewing machine for hems.

loans.name: Amildar

texts.es:
El señor Amildar R. Muñoz tiene 19 años de edad y vive en una casa en alquiler junto a sus padres vivienda que esta ubicada en el barrio Simon Bolivar de esta ciudad de Tarija. Amildar  es soltero y no tiene hijos, desde muy pequeño su padre le enseño a trabajar primero como albañil y ahora realiza trabajos de conexiones eléctricas en las diferentes construcciones de la ciudad. Ahora el tiene que trabajar para poder salir adelante. Amildar desde hace  3 años que trabaja como electricista siendo una persona muy conocida por sus clientes que solicitan sus servicios,  Amildar quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante, pero el nos cuenta que tiene la necesidad de comprar mas herramientas de trabajo,  ya que tiene un trabajo grande donde las herramientas que tiene no le abastecen. De esa forma poder  realizar los trabajos que tiene por hacer, como el ya tiene experiencia en el rubro el crédito será destinado para la compra de dichas herramientas de trabajo  que es necesario para realizar su actividad para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos.
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Amildar nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite será para la compra de una máquina de soldar.
texts.en:
Amildar R. Muñoz is 19-years-old and lives in a house that he rents along with his parents.  The house is located in the Simon Bolivar neighborhood of the city of Tarija.  Amildar is single and doesn’t have children.  Since he was very young his father has taught him to work, first as a carpenter and now he works with electrical connections in different construction sites in the city.  Now he has to work to get ahead.  Amildar started working as an electrician three years ago and is well-known by his customers who request his services.  Amildar wants to have better income to get ahead but he tells us that he needs to buy more tools for his work as now he has a big job that the tools he has will not be sufficient for.  In this way he can finish the jobs he has to do and as he has experience in the field, the loan will be put towards buying said working tools that are necessary to do his work so that he can increase his earnings.

Amildar tells us that he wants to improve the conditions he lives in and due to this the next loan he requests will be to purchase a soldering machine.

loans.use: to buy tools for electrician work.

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas Achieng O. is a young married lady. Her husband is a businessman and they have four children between the ages of eight and two, whom they hope to educate to university level. Her business is located at the busy Nyalenda market in Kisumu. Kisumu is the region in Kenya that harbors Lake Victoria and is commonly referred to as the lake basin.

Dorcas runs a dressmaking and embroidery business and her major customers are the ladies. She has been operating this business for four years now and has managed to provide employment to two people. She says that this business is profitable and the major challenge she has is lack of enough equipment for embroidery. However, she works very hard from early morning to late evening to keep her business doing well

Dorcas is using this loan of 30,000 KES to purchase materials and a sewing machine to grow her business and meet the demands of her customers. She hopes to grow her business and increase her sales. She describes herself as quiet, soft spoken and honest.

loans.use: to buy materials and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.en: Benjamin is 35 years old and married with eight children.  He offers public address services.  He has been earning a living from this business for twelve years.  He runs the business with three employees.  He has been able to sustain his business because of his hard work and dedication.  He hopes to have a fully established business in the future.  He has requested 30,000 KES to buy a generator.

loans.use: to buy a generator.

loans.name: Ithemba Lomama Group

texts.en:
Thandiwe is 51 years of age and married with seven children between the ages of 14 and 24. She runs a small retail business in Mandini, South Africa. In the photo she is wearing a white shirt and raising her hand.

She's been in this business for three years and sells snacks, airtime, fruits and vegetables from her home. She does not have any other source of income. She says that the main challenges to her business are customers who buy on credit and end up failing to pay, and some just disappear.

Thandiwe requested this loan through Women’s Development Businesses to buy snacks, airtime, fruits and vegetables to resell. She says that extra income from this loan will help her send her children for third level education. In five years time she would like to own a spaza shop (small convenience store).

She appreciates WDB and KIVA for making her life easier by appearing on the website.

loans.use: to buy snacks, airtime, fruits and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Stanslaus

texts.en: Stanslaus, a 44-year-old, is married and has four children.  He has been earning a living by selling fruits, sweets, biscuits and soda.  He runs his business under a shade tree.  Through the trainings offered by Faulu Kenya on financial education, he has gained a lot of business knowledge.  He hopes that one day he will own a kiosk.  He is determined to take his business to another level in the future.  He has requested 20,000 KES to buy fruits, biscuits and sweets for resale.

loans.use: to buy fruits, biscuits and sweets for resale.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine, age 48, is married Kahoro and they have two children. Her primary business is M-PESA (mobile money transfer service) but she sells electronics alongside. She has been in this business for ten years and this is her first loan from KADET.

She will use the anticipated profits to open several M-PESA outlets and hopes to operate a large wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy a stock of electronics to sell.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: El sr. Tomas es un cliente nuevo, con buena referencia crediticia, se dedica a la elaboración de muebles de todo tipo y además de la elaboración de puertas y otros. El sr. Tomas es un cliente muy trabajador con mucha experiencia, hace 33 años que inicio su actividad y oficio, como carpintero, razón por la cual llegó a equipar su taller con todos los equipos necesarios como: tupy, escoplo, torno, circular (parqueteadora), todo esto con la ayuda de su familia, que siempre esta siempre a su lado apoyándolo. El dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de madera para la fabricacion de muebles, el Sr. Tomas vive en  la zona sagrado corazón de Jesús, desde mucho tiempo, es bueno también señalar que el Sr. Tomas, es  la primera vez que trabaja con una institución financiera, razón por la cual esta entusiasmado en trabajar con " emprender"  y espera sacar montos mas altos con el transcurrir del tiempo, es una persona muy responsable agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Tomas is a new client with good credit references.  He manufactures furniture of all sorts and also makes doors and other items.  Tomas is a very hard working, experienced client.  He started working as a Carpenter 33 years ago and has managed to equip his shop with all the necessary equipment: chisels, lathe, saws, Tupi combination saws, etc.  All of this with help from his family who is always by his side supporting him.

He will use the loan to buy lumber to make furniture.

Tomas has lived in the Sagrado Corazón de Jesús zone for a long time.  It’s worth highlighting that this is the first time Tomas has worked with a financial institution so he is very excited about working with Emprender and hopes to take out larger loans as time goes by.  He is a responsible person who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy cedar to make furniture.

loans.name: Timothy

texts.en: Timothy is 51 years old, married, and has four children.  He makes wallets and belts, using leather.  He has been in the business for fifteen years.  So far, he has employed two people in his business.  He had previously serviced a loan from Faulu Kenya which he used to boost his business. Currently, he needs raw material (leather) for making belts and wallets.  For this reason, he has requested 30,000 KES to buy more leather.

loans.use: to buy more leather.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en: Jacinta is 33 years old and she runs a salon to earn a living.  Even though she runs her business in a very competitive environment, she is able to attract more customers because of her good services.  She has employed one person to assist her in her business.  In the future, she hopes to open other business outlets and employ more people.  She has requested 40,000 KES to buy a hair dryer and combs.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and combs.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: La señora Elena,   es una clienta nueva de la institución, que demostró un trato amable y Cortez en la evaluación que se le realizo la Sra. Elena, ella se dedica a la venta y flete de ropa para cholitas, compra la ropa por mayor o compra según pedido, con el dinero del credito comprara ropa por mayor como bluzas y después lo vende o alquila para distintas fiestas, vive en la zona de Tacagua, de la ciudad de La Paz -Bolivia, la Sra. Elena en la actualidad vive con sus cuatro pequeños niños que se encuentran en edad escolar, pero cuenta con la ayuda de su mamá para el cuidado de ellos, el esposo por razones de trabajo se encuentra en la ciudad de santa cruz.   La Sra. Elena es muy trabajadora y además abnegada con sus hijos, ella tiene la voluntad de que con trabajo un día tendrá su casa propia y además que sus hijos lleguen a tener una carrera profesional, por lo que se esfuerza a lograrlo día a día, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Elena is a new client of the institution.  She behaved kindly and courteously during the evaluation process.  She sells and rents clothes for "cholitas.” ("Chola" is a widely used term which generally refers to people with various amounts of Amerindian racial ancestry).  She buys the clothes at wholesale or on order.  She will use the loan money to buy blouses at wholesale to later resell or lease for different festivals.  She lives in the Tacagua zone in La Paz, Bolivia.

Elena currently lives with four small children who are school age.  Her mother helps her care for them.  Her husband, for work related reasons, is in the city of Santa Cruz.

Elena is very hard working and quite long suffering with her children.  She has the expectation that through her work she will someday have a house of her own and that her children will finish professional careers.  Because of this she strives daily to accomplish this.  She is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy 10 "cholita" skirts and a dozen blouses.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 34 years old, married and blessed with four children.  He started his carpentry business four years ago.  He was able to start the business after getting capital from Faulu Kenya.  Then, he left his employment and went fully into business.  Currently, he is setting up a barbershop and a video show business in his rural home. He has requested 20,000 KES to buy timber, plywood and block board.

loans.use: To buy timber, plywood and block board

loans.name: Kossi Apédo

texts.fr: Pompiste  de profession, Kossi  a 37 ans et est mariée à une revendeuse .il a deux enfants. Depuis 2000 il s’est lancé dans la vente de bouteille de gaz car il a constaté que le réapprovisionnement du  gaz se fait rare dans les ménages. Son approvisionnement se déroule à Lomé et après il distribue aux ménages  qui lui font la demande. Ce crédit sera destiné  à l’achat de bouteilles de gaz pour satisfaire en nombre voulu les familles dans ce besoin.
texts.en:
Kossi is a gas station attendant. He is 37 years old and married to a retailer. He has two children. 

In 2000, he started selling bottles of gas after realizing that the supply is scarce for most households. 

He gets the gas in Lomé and sells to households who request to be replenished. 

He will use this loan to buy enough bottles of gas to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy bottles of gas for resale

loans.name: Zabron

texts.en: Zabron is 30 years old and single.  He runs a retail business selling cereals to earn a living.   His business is only six months old.  In addition, he does outside catering for extra income.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has developed a saving culture.  This has helped him to manage his finances.  He hopes to have a well-established business in the future.  He has requested 20,000 KES to start a business selling mobile phone accessories.

loans.use: To start a business selling mobile phone accessories

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel de 47 años de edad, tiene casa propia de material rústico, la cual cuenta con agua y luz, ubicada en el Caserío Huaca Blanca a 10 minutos  del distrito de San José y a unos 15 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Esta zona rural se dedica a la pesca, ganadería y agricultua.

Manuel desde hace 4 años se dedica a la ganadería,actualmente cuenta con 3 vacas que ordeña diariamente  para obtener leche fresca y poder venderla a otros recolectores de leche, los cuales se encargan de vender la al  por menor o mayor .  Las ganacias que obtenga es para cubrir sus necesidades diarias.

Debido ha la falta de agua , el pasto se ha escaseado en la zona para que pueda alimentar a su ganado vacuno (vaca), por lo que se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles, los cuales los invertirá en la compra de forraje (pasto natural) y alfalfa para su ganado y de esa manera tener una mejor producción de leche, para ofertarlo a un buen precio con la finalidad de pagar su préstamo y que su negocio cresca.

Manuel es conicido en la zona por ser una persona trabajadora, responsable y con el fin de que algún día pueda tener su propio establo con mucho ganado.
texts.en:
Manuel is 47 years old he has his own home made of rustic materials and has running water and electricity; it is located in Caserío Huaca Blanca and is some 10 minutes from the district of San José and 15 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. In this rural area most of the residents work in fishing, cattle breeding and agriculture.

For 4 years, Manuel has raised cattle, currently he has 3 cows that he milks daily to have fresh milk and sells it to other milk collectors who sell theirs retail or wholesale. The earnings that he gets are to cover his daily expenses.

Due to the lack of water, the grass has gotten scarce in the area and it's a problem to feed his cows which is why he needs a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa which will be used to buy fodder (natural grass) and alfalfa for his cattle, this will allow him to have better milk production and sell it at a good price with the goal of paying back his loan and seeing his business grow.

Manuel is known in his area for being a hardworking, responsible person and hopes to one day have his own stable with a lot of cattle.

loans.use: buy food (fodder and alfalfa) for his cattle.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El Sr. Juan, es una persona que trabaja como encargado de albañilería en una empresa que construyen casas,   el como su esposa se apoyan económicamente para los gastos de la casa y como pronto se casaron todos sus hijos y la  familia crecera , el Sr. Juan desea  terminar  la  construcción de una habitación mas a su pequeña casa, agradece  a  la institución  por  el  apoyo  brindado  para  la  realización de  su  proyecto.
texts.en: Juan works as a construction manager at a housing construction company. He and his wife both work to support their family. Juan hopes to complete an additional room on his small house, since all of his children will be married soon and the family will be growing. He is grateful to the financial institution for this support that will allow him to complete his housing project.

loans.use: To construct a room.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is 37 years old and married with two children.  For eight years, he has been welding to earn a living for his family.  He has sustained his business because he has gained a lot of business knowledge from the trainings conducted by Faulu Kenya.  In the future, he wants to expand his business.  He has requested 20,000 KES to buy a welding machine.

loans.use: To buy a welding machine

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es:
María de 24 años de edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijos que cuenta con el servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el caserío Luchadores Sociales del distrito de Tambogrande a unos 40 minutos del departamento de Piura.   Zona que desarrolla la actividad agrícola,  ganadera y artesana.

María se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chicha de jora (bebida realizada a base de maíz molido que lo dejan fermentar y luego le colocan otros insumos y está lista para consumirla) y de harina de maíz, lo prepara en su mismo domicilio, actividad que realiza desde hace 4 años  y lo ofrece a sus clientes que la conocen, de esta manera ella se ayuda a tener más ingresos económicos ya que con lo que su esposo le da diariamente nomles alcanza para solventar sus gasto familiares.

A solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar insumos y utensilios para seguir elaborando la chicha de jora que vende y la harina de maíz, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos, ya que su clientela se ha incrementado, para poder pagar su cuota y de paso mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  María desea que más adelante su negocio cresca para seguir ayudando a su familia y brindarle mejores comodidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is 24 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and children. The house has running water and light, it is located in the Luchadores Sociales hamlet, district of Tambogrande some 40 minutes from the department of Piura. Most of the inhabitants in the area are farmers, cattle breeders and in handicrafts.

María makes and sells chicha de jora (a drink made from grinded corn that is fermented and is then added some ingredients and its ready to be consumed) and corn flour that she makes in her home. She has been working for 4 years in this field and she offers products to her customers and this way she can have more income since what her husband makes is not enough to meet the household expenses.

María went to Edpyme Alternative for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy supplies and utensils to keep making chicha de jora and corn flour which will allow her to have more income since her customers have increased. María will be able to pay her loan and improve her families’ quality of life. She hopes that in the future her business will grow to keep supporting her family and to give greater comfort to her children.

loans.use: buy supplies and utensils to make chicha de jora.

loans.name: Atossowè

texts.fr: Veuve de 43 ans, Mme Atossowoè a deux enfants. Pour subvenir aux besoins des siens elle s’est lancée dans la vente de charbons de bois depuis 1998 : elle s’approvisionne à Anié une ville tropicale située dans la région des plateaux au  nord de la ville de Lomé et revend après à domicile. Ce premier crédit lui servira à augmenter son actif pour satisfaire la demande, assurer un avenir radieux à elle et à ses enfants.
texts.en: A widow of 43, Mrs. Atossowoè has two children. In order to support her little family, she got into the sale of charcoal back in 1998. She buys her supply at Anié, a tropical town situated in the highlands north of the city of Lomé, and she sells the charcoal out of her home. This first loan will serve to add to her stock in trade so as to satisfy demand and ensure a bright future for her and her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Yrma

texts.es:
Yrma de 45 años de edad, vive en casa propia sola, cuenta solamente con servicio de luz, ubicada en el caserío el Totoral a unos 10 minutos de distrito de Tambgrande  y a  40 minutos del  departamento de  Piura.  Todas esta zonas se dedica ha la actividad agricola,  ganadera y turismo.

Yrma ha implementado en su domilcilio su tienda de productos de primera necesidad (leche, azúcar, arroz, azúcar, todo tipo de golosinas, etc.) y utensilios de uso doméstico,  para seguridad y comodidad de ella y de algún modo pueda atender a cualquier hora a sus  clientes, en la cual  encuentran todo lo que necesitan para su uso diario, con el negocio que a colocado trata en lo posible de que sus clientes estén satisfechos. Otra actividad que realiza también es la crianza de algunas aves de corral, con las ventas de ambos negocios trata de tener una mejor calidad de vida.

A creido conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa adquirir un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles para abastecer su tienda de diversa mercadería (productos comestibles y utensiliosde uso doméstico) y así pueda satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, con la finalidad de incrementar  sus ingresos para pagar su préstamo y mejorar su negocio.  Yrma es concocida en su caserío por ser una persona amable, alegre y muy trabajadora, siempre con ganas salir adelante.
texts.en:
Yrma is 45 years old, and lives alone in her own home and only has electricity. It is located in the Totoral hamlet some 10 minutes from the district of Tambogrande and 40 minutes from the department of Piura. Most of the inhabitants in the area are farmers, cattle breeders and in handicrafts.

Yrma created in her home a small grocery store where she sells basic household goods (milk, sugar, rice and all types of candy, etc.) and household utensils. For her security and comfort she takes care of her customers whenever they need anything and they find everything they need for their daily use and are satisfied. Yrma also breeds certain farmyard fowl. With the sales of both businesses she tries to have a better quality of life.

Yrma went to Edpyme Alternativa to get a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to supply her store with different merchandize (foodstuff and utensils for domestic use) to meet the needs of her customers, this will help her increase her earnings to pay her loan and improve her business. Yrma is known in her town as a nice, happy and very hardworking person who always has the drive to get ahead.

loans.use: buy more merchandize to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is 31 years old and single.  He is a mechanic by profession.  He also sells auto spare parts to earn a living.  He has employed one person to assist him in his business.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has learned how to manage his business.  This has helped him to sustain his business for 11 years.  He needs 20,000 KES to buy auto spare parts.

loans.use: To buy auto spare parts

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa D. 48 años D. edad, vive en su casa propia con unos familiares, no cuenta con ningún servicio , ubicado en el caserio San Isidro que pertenece al distrito D. TambogranD., a una hora D. distancia del departamneto D. Piura.  Esta zona  se caracteriza por tener una mucha actividad agricola, ganadera, artesanía y turismo. 

Rosa se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza por catálogo, ésta actividad lo realiza desD. hace algunos años, tiene su propia clientela que le hace pedidos, pero además recorre las casas D. su caserío ofreciendo sus productos.  Los cuales sirven para  mejorar la imagen personal, y son consumidos por más clientela femenina, con estos ingresos D. sus ventas se ayuda para solventar sugastos y necesidades.

A solicitado Rosa a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 500 nuevos soles para comprar productos y exhibirlos en su casa y así sus clientas tengan esos productos a la mano cuandolo deseen. Con los ingresos D. la venta D. todos sus productos cubriría las cuotas del crédito brindado y mejoraría su calidad D. vida.  Rosa es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, alegre y muy responsable con su clientela y negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa is 48 years old, she lives in her own home with some family members but her home doesn’t have any basic services. Rosa’s home is located in the San Isidro hamlet, district of TambogranD. an hour from the department of Piura. Most of the inhabitants in the area are farmers, cattle breeders and in handicrafts.

Rosa has been selling beauty products by catalogue for several years. She has her own customer base that she takes orders from, and goes to houses in her neighborhood offering her products. Rosa’s products serve to improve ones personal image and they are consumed mostly by females. She uses her earnings to help meet her expenses and needs.

Rosa went to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 500 nuevos soles to buy products and show them at home so that her customers have greater access to them. With the income from the sales of all of her products she will be able to pay back the loan and improve her quality of life. Rosa is very well-known for being a hardworking, happy and very responsible woman with her customers and business.

loans.use: buy more beauty products for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE - CUSCO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 33 años de edad;  la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 2 años de edad, la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la ayuda brindada a su conyugue, su pareja es artista, el pinta cuadros en lienzo y bastidores rústicos, ella le apoya en todo lo que pueda y en la venta final de estos cuadros, la socia y su conyugue tienen desde hace 3 meses un espacio en internet en el cual exponen sus cuadros y mediante estos ellos pueden ofrecerlos; la socia ahora no tiene la dirección exacta de este sitio pero nos indica que esta a nombre de “ Simeon G.”; la socia desea poder tener una galería de los cuadros de su pareja para poder exponerlos y tener más diversidad para ofrecer al público, la socia desea el crédito para ayudar a su conyugue a comprar  los materiales para los lienzos y las pinturas para la elaboración de mayor numero de cuadros. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de cuadros.

La socia  se encuentra feliz y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus respectivas cuotas en el tiempo programado en reunión y cumplir de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called "VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE - CUSCO".  This bank is located in the Huanchac district, in the province and state of Cuzco.  

The member is 33 years old.  She lives with her common law husband and has a two year old son.  She alternates between housework with helping her partner, who is an artist.  He paints on canvas with rustic frames. She helps him as much as she can, and helps sell his work.  For the past three months they have shown his work for sale online.  She does not have the exact address of the site, but says it is in the name of "Simeon G.." Nelida would like to have a gallery for her partner's work to be able to show them and have more diverse offerings for the public. She is requesting this loan to help him purchase canvas and paint to create more work.  

The associate is happy and promises to comply with the payment plan during the allotted time and to pay in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to purchase materials to create painings.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Dominga es una madre de familia de 49 años de edad, vive con su hija en su casa propia de material rústico, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en el caserío Palo Blanco que pertenece al distrito de Olmos a unos 20 minutos y a  una hora del departamento de Lambayeque.  Está zona los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.
Dominga se dedica a la comercialización de maracuyá y frejol (panamito) es una especie, en sus tierras de cultivo que tiene, una vez que cosecha sus productos las ofertas en los diferentes mercados tanto de Lambayeque como Chiclayo, esto le permite tener ingresos para solventar sus necesidades diarias.  Otra forma como obtiene más dinero es criando y vendiendo aves de corral (gallina, patos y pollos), una vez que los engorda los ofrece a los comerciantes de la zona.
Para seguir teniendo una mejor calidad ha creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles para terminar la construcción de su vivienda ya que solo cuenta con un cuarto grande, el cual no es suficiente cómodo para dos personas  donde realizan todas sus actividades.  Por eso Dominga con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo trata de tener mayores ingresos económicos con las ventas de sus productos para poder pagar el crédito brindado y darle a su hija un mejor nivel de vida que se lo merece, ya que la ayuda en todas las actividades que realiza.
texts.en:
Dominga is a 49 year old mother that lives with her daughter in her own rustic home. The house doesn’t have any basic services and it is located in the Palo Blanco neighborhood some 20 minutes from the district of Olmos and an hour from the Lambayeque department. Most of the inhabitants in the area are farmers, cattle breeders and in handicrafts.

Dominga sells maracuyá (a type of passion fruit similar to pomegranate) and panamito beans. She harvests her products in her land and sells them to different markets in Lambayeque and Chiclayo to have enough income to meet her daily expenses. She also breeds and sells farmyard birds (hens, ducks, and chickens) once she fattens them up she sells them to traders in the area.

To continue to have better quality products, Dominga decided to get a loan of 800 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to finish building her home as it only has a large room and is not comfortable enough for two people where they do all of their activities. This is why Dominga works with a lot of effort to get more income from the sales of her products to pay the loan and to give her daughter a better quality of life since she deserves it and helps her in all of the work that she does.

loans.use: finish building her home.

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Née le 20 /12/1977, et femme mariée à un entrepreneur bâtiment, Ablavi à un enfant. Elle tient une boutique des produits de premières nécessités (huile végétale, sucre, riz…) à son domicile depuis un an et pour ses besoins d’achats, s’approvisionne au grand marché. Elle aimerait apporter la pierre à l’édifice dans l’éducation de leurs enfants d’où ce prêt qui l’aidera à augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Born on December 20, 1977 and married to a building entrepreneur, Ablavi has one child. She has been tending a shop selling staple goods (vegetable oil, sugar, rice, etc.) in her house for one year now and she buys her supplies in the big market. She wants to make absolutely certain of their children's education, hence this loan which will help her expand her stock in trade.

loans.use: to buy staple goods (sugar, rice, etc.).

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
ClotilD. madre D. familia D. 68 años D. edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijas; que son independientes, la cual cuenta con el servicio D. agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito La Matanza que pertenece a la provincia D. Morropón y está a una distancia D. 20 minutos, y a una hora aproximadamente del departamento D. Piura.   Zona que desarrolla la actividad agrícola,  ganadera y artesana.

ClotilD. se dedica a la comercialización D. chicha D. jora (bebida realizada a base D. maíz molido que lo dejan fermentar y luego le colocan otros insumos y está lista para consumirla) y D. harina D. maíz, lo prepara en su mismo domicilio, actividad que realiza desD. hace 10 años  y lo ofrece a sus clientes que la conocen, D. esta manera ella se ayuda a tener más ingresos económicos, su esposo es agricultor, su jornal es diario y poco, por eso necesita otras formas para tener dinero.

A solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar insumos para seguir elaborando la chicha D. jora que venD. y la harina D. maíz, los pedidos  que le hacen le permite tener mayores ganancias, ya que su clientela se ha incrementado considerablemente,  para poder pagar su cuota mensual y D. paso mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.  ClotilD. desea que más adelante su negocio crezca para seguir ayudando a sus hijas y brindarles mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
ClotilD. is a 68 year old mother and wife. She lives in her own home with her husband and daughters, who are grown. Her house has electricity and running water and is located in the district of  La Matanza, which belongs to the province of Morropón and is approximately an hour an 20 minutes from the department of Piura.  In this area, there is a lot of farming activity, cattle raising and artisanal crafts. 

ClotilD. sells chicha D. jora (a beverage maD. with a corn meal base, fermented and later mixed with other ingredients until its ready for consumption) and corn meal. She prepares the drink in her own house, and has done it for 10 years. She offers it to people who know her and in this way is able to have more income. Her husband is a farmer and he works daily, but not very much. That is why she needs other ways to make money.  

She has asked for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2000 nuevos soles in order to buy ingredients to keep making the chicha D. jora that she sells as well as corn meal. The orders she is making are so she can have more earnings, since her clientele has increased considerably. It is also to be able to make her monthly payments and improve her family's quality of life. In the future, ClotilD. wants her business to grow to keep helping her daughters and to offer them better opportunities.

loans.use: to buy ingredients needed to make chicha de jora, as well as corn meal.

loans.name: Gerphas

texts.en: Gerphas is a 41-year-old man who is married and has two children.  He repairs vehicles to earn a living.  He has been in the business for six years.  Being a member of Faulu Kenya, he has gained knowledge of business management.  This has helped him to grow his business.  He hopes to open other outlets of his business and employ more people.  He has requested 20,000 KES to buy auto spare parts.

loans.use: To buy auto spare parts

loans.name: Elena Violeta

texts.es:
Elena es una mujer soltera de 46 años de edad, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Monsefú a unos 15 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Los pobladores de éste distrito se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía. 
Elena  se dedica a la compra y venta de carne de pollo y gallina al por menor para el consumo de las personas y los vende en el mercado San José de Monsefú actividad que realiza desde hace algunos años, este trabajo lo realiza todos los días por las mañanas desde muy temprano, con la finalidad de tener todo listo una vez que empieza la atención en el mercado y así podrá atender a su clientela sin demora, como ya tiene una clientela fija no tiene porque preocuparse, al final de de su jornada tenga los ingresos necesarios para solventar sus gastos.
El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 2000 nuevos soles y su destino será para comprar mayor cantidad de carne de aves para seguir ofertándolo en el mercado a sus clientes ya que su  clientela se ha incrementado por vender productos sanos y de calidad.
El sueño de Elena es que más adelante sea proveedora mayorista de todo tipo de carnes en los diferentes  mercados, para que mejore la calidad de vida de ella y de sus padres.
texts.en:
Elena is a single 46 year old woman. She lives in her parents' house, which has electricity and running water and is located in the district of  Monsefú, 15 minutes from the province of Chiclayo. The inhabitants of this district work in agriculture, cattle raising and artisanal crafts. 
 
Elena buys and sells chicken meat for personal consumption and to sell in the market of San José de Monsefú. She has done this for some years, and she does the work every day from very early in the morning so that she can have everything ready to start serving her customers without delay in the market. She already has regular clientele and doesn't have to worry about having enough income at the end of the day to support herself. 

The loan she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for is for 2000 nuevos soles and it is to be used to buy a larger quantity of poultry meat to keep offering it in the market to her customers, since her clientele has increased by selling healthy, quality products. 

Elena's dream for the future is to be a wholesale supplier of all types of meat in different markets, so that she can improve her own quality of life and her parents'.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of poultry meat to offer her customers.

loans.name: Narciso 	Jose

texts.es: El señor Narciso nacido en Cochabamba con 5 hijos quienes estudian y trabajan junto a su papa vive con doña Feliciana también nacida en Cochabamba hace 10 años que se vinieron a buscar nuevos horizontes y lo encontraron. Ella tiene su tierra en Villa Barrientos a 16 km de Santa Rita, cuenta con una parcela de 10 hectáreas 6 tareas en la cual trabaja agricultura pero también se dedican a la ganadería y elaboraciones de carbón, también tiene tierras en el Beni que lo hacen trabajar, el dinero del crédito lo utilizaran el la compra de semillas para la siembra de maíz, son una familia muy unida trabajan juntos por su bienestar, el sr. Narciso es una persona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Narciso was born in Cochabamba and has five children who go to school and work with their father. He lives with Feliciana, who was also born in Cochabamba. Ten years ago, they came here looking for a better future, and they found it.

He has his land in Villa Barrientos, 16 km from Santa Rita. He has a 10-hectare plot, and he farms it, but they also work in ranching and making charcoal. He also has land in Beni that he works. They will use the loan money to buy seeds for sowing corn.

They are a very close family and work together for their well-being. Narciso is a very hard-working person, and he is grateful to the institution for the support he has been offered.

loans.use: to sow six hectares of corn.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is 36 years old, married and a father of three.  He sells curios in an open-air market.  He has engaged in the business for 15 years.  In addition, he does farming to earn extra income.  He has employed two people to assist him in the business.  He hopes to have a permanent business premise in the future. He has requested 50,000 KES to buy African design fabric, beads and carved lions, giraffes and zebra.

loans.use: To buy African design fabric, beads and carved lions, giraffes and zebra

loans.name: Albeiro Arleyson

texts.es:
Albeiro es un microempresario que desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a vender frutas y verduras en diferentes negocios ubicados en el municipio de Yarumal en el departamento de Antioquia, pues la difícil situación económica por la que atravesaba su familia lo obligaron a conocer la ley del rebusque desde niño, lo que lo ha fortalecido y le ha permitido convertirse en un hombre luchador que a pesar de las dificultades ha querido superarse y salir adelante. 
 
Hoy a sus 25 años emprende un su propio negocio, una legumbrería que le ha dado la oportunidad de ser independiente y generar ingresos para su familia, Albeiro trabaja todos los días de 5:30 de la mañana a 8:00 de la noche y aunque su jornada es larga, Albeiro considera que sólo bajo los principios de responsabilidad, emprendimiento y dedicación puede lograr materializar su sueño de convertir su legumbrería en un supermercado que ofrezca a sus clientes gran variedad de productos y poder construir así su casa propia. 
 
Actualmente Albeiro quiere que su legumbrería cada vez tenga más clientes y como estrategia pretende surtir gran variedad de productos y hacerle algunas adecuaciones a las instalaciones del negocio, para ello necesita de un préstamo debido a que sus ingresos no son suficientes para cubrir dicha inversión.
texts.en:
Albeiro is a small businessman who, from a very young age, has sold fruits and vegetables in different businesses located in the town of Yarumal, in Antioquia Department. Because of the difficult economic situation his family went through, from childhood he had to learn the law of hard work, which has strengthened him and has allowed him to become an enterprising man who, despite difficulties, has wanted to excel and get ahead in life.
 
Today, at 25 years old, he is setting out to run his own business, a fruit and vegetable store which has given him the opportunity to be independent and generate income for his family. Albeiro works everyday from 5:30 am until 8:00 pm, and although his workday is long, Albeiro believes that only with responsibility, an enterprising spirit and dedication can he make his dream come true, the dream of turning his fruit and vegetable store into a supermarket that offers his customers a large variety of products so he will be able to build his own house.
 
Right now Albeiro wants his fruit and vegetable store to have more and more customers, and as a strategy he intends to stock a large variety of products and make some changes to the premises. To do this, he needs a loan because his income is not high enough to cover such an investment.

loans.use: to stock his fruit and vegetable store and make changes to the premises

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.es:
Vanessa es una joven de 19 años de Medellín que por la falta de recursos y oportunidades, se ha dedicado a vender postres por diferentes barrios de la ciudad, esta labor la desempeña principalmente en las mañanas pues como madre cabeza de hogar de sus gemelos de 3 meses de edad, debe dedicarles gran parte de su tiempo pues requieren no sólo de su cuidado y atención si no también de su constante acompañamiento. 
 
Vanessa compra los postres a un proveedor y posteriormente se encarga de distribuirlos en las diferentes tiendas que le  compran diariamente o semanalmente. Su gran impulso son sus hijos por los cuales se motiva a trabajar diariamente y a seguir luchando porque espera ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. Sin embargo su trabajo tiene varias dificultades, una de ellas es el transporte de los postres que en algunos casos afecta la calidad de los mismos, por lo cual Vanessa necesita comprar por lo menos 2 neveras que le permitan transportar fácil y cómodamente los productos, igualmente poder comprar mayor cantidad de productos y así generar más utilidades, pero lamentablemente ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para esta inversión que le permitirá aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Vanessa is a 19-year-old girl from Medellín who, because of a lack of resources and opportunity, has started selling desserts in several neighborhoods in the city. She does this work mainly in the mornings because she is a mother and head of household for her three-month-old twins. She must give them most of her time because they need not only her care and attention, but also to be with her constantly.
 
Vanessa buys the desserts from a supplier and then distributes them to the many stores that buy from her daily or weekly. Her children are her big motivation; because of them, she is motivated to work everyday and to keep striving because she hopes to offer them a better quality of life. However, her work has several problems. One of them is transporting the desserts, which sometimes affects their quality. For this reason Vanessa needs to buy at least two coolers, which will enable her to transport her products easily and comfortably. She will also be able to buy more products, thus generating more profit, but unfortunately she does not have the capital she needs for this investment that will allow her to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy coolers for distribution and an assortment of products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sugar, milk, maize flour and soap.

loans.name: Erminda

texts.es: La señora Erminda nacida en Valle grande el 25 de Julio de 1978 con 2 hijos pequeños vive en Guaracal a 10 km de Jorochito donde tiene su parcela,  que junto a su esposo trabajan  enla siembra de  papa, tomate y camote, después de cosechar comercializan en el mercado de la comunidad, con el dinero del crédito comprara semillas, para la siembra de Papa y los demás productos que la Sra. siembra, es una persona muy trabajadora y combina sus dos labores la de madre y agricultora, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Erminda was born in Valle Grande on July 25, 1978. She has two young children and lives in Guaracal, 10km from Jorochito where her farm land is located. Erminda works with her husband to farm potatoes, tomatoes, and sweet potatoes. After the harvest, they sell their produce in the local market. 

With this loan, she will buy seeds to plan potatoes and other crops. Erminda is very hardworking, as both a farmer and as a mother. She is grateful to this financial institution for its support.

loans.use: To plant potatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE - CUSCO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 23 años de edad;  la socia es soltera, la socia actualmente se encuentra trabajando en el I.N.C Instituto Nacional de Cultura; la socia  alterna en los ratos libres con la atención de su propio negocio de fotocopiadoras, la socia invierte en su negocio poco a poco y esta vez ella requiere el crédito para poder comprar papel en millares, tinta para la máquina, tóner y aceite para el mantenimiento de la misma. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la fotocopiadora. 


La socia esta agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is named “Virgen de Guadalupe – Cusco.”  This bank is located in the district of Huanchac which belongs to Cusco province and the department of Cusco.

The member is 23-years-old, single, and currently works in the National Institute of Culture.  She also works in her free time attending to her own photocopy business.  She invests in her business little by little and this time she needs the loan to be able to buy reams of paper, ink for the machine, toner, and oil for maintenance.  She is requesting the loan to invest in materials for the photocopier.

The member is very thankful and would like to express that she will follow through in a disciplined manner with her payments.

loans.use: to invest in photocopying materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a new room in his house.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
El Banco comunal se denomina “VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE - CUSCO”; Este Banco se encuentra situado en el Distrito de Huanchac, perteneciente a la Provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 22 años de edad;  la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 1 año y 9 meses de edad; la socia trabaja en un hotel y ella se encarga de la limpieza, la socia es una joven muy trabajadora y deseas darle a su hijo lo mejor, la socia los días sábados tienen un puesto ambulatorio en el tradicional baratillo es una especie de mercado de pulgas en el se puede encontrar desde un clavo hasta  motores de Caterpillar; la socia vende cosas de segunda todo lo que pueda encontrar y recolectar ella lo lleva a vender a este lugar. La socia requiere el préstamo para comprar cosas viejas en diferentes barrios y llevarlos a vender a este famoso sitio llamado Baratillo que significa barato. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar artefactos y otros de segunda, mano.

La socia esta agradecida y desea expresar que cumplirá de manera  disciplinadamente con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The communal bank is called "VIRGEN DE GUADALUPE - CUSCO".  This bank is located in the Huanchac district, in the province and state of Cuzco.  

The member is 22 years old.  She lives with her common law husband and has a son who is 21 months old.  She works in a hotel as a housekeeper.  She is a very hard worker and wants to provide her son with the best.   On Saturdays she has a stand in the traditional "baratillo", which is a type of flea market where you can find anything from a nail to Caterpillar motors. Martha sells second hand items.  Whatever she finds and collects she takes to sell at this place.  She is requesting a loan to purchase old items in different neighborhoods and take them to sell in the famous site called "Baratillo", which means "cheap".  She is requesting a loan to purchase second hand items. 

She is thankful and will be disciplined about meeting her payment obligations.

loans.use: to purchase second hand goods for sale.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: El señor Francisco se dedica a la elaboración de calzados y su esposa es comerciante y realiza viajes al oriente del país. El crédito lo requiere para comprar: cuerinas, pegamentos, plantillas. Vive en casa propia la misma esta ubicada en la zona 16 De Julio en la ciudad de El Alto,  es casado y tiene un hijo. El cliente esta satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron ya que pudo aumentar su capital de trabajo y ampliar su negocio. Es cliente nuestro desde el año 2005.
texts.en: Francisco works making shoes and his wife is a merchant and takes trips to the west of the country. He needs the loan to buy: color samples, glues, and insoles. He lives in his own house, which is in the area called 16 De Julio in the city of El Alto. He is married and has one son. This client is satisfied with the loans that have been awarded to him as he was able to increase his business capital and grow his business. He has been a client of ours since 2005.

loans.use: To buy materials like color samples, glue, insoles, for his shoe making business.
